2.name: Resurrection Signet
2.desc_full: Signet. Resurrect target party member. That party member is returned to life with 100% Health and 25% Energy. This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.
2.desc_concise: Signet. Resurrects target party member (100% Health, 25% Energy). This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.

3.name: Signet of Capture
3.desc_full: Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite , gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.
3.desc_concise: Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.

1403.name: Agonizing Chop
1403.desc_full: Axe Attack. When this attack hits, you deal + [!5...17...20!] damage. If target foe is suffering from a Deep Wound , you interrupt that foe's action.
1403.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Interrupts an action if target foe has a Deep Wound.

334.name: Axe Rake
334.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound , you strike for + [!1...8...10!] damage , and that foe becomes Crippled for 15 seconds.
334.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!1...8...10!] damage and inflicts Crippled condition (15 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

342.name: Axe Twist
342.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound , you strike for [!1...16...20!] more damage and that foe suffers from Weakness for 20 seconds.
342.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!1...16...20!] damage and inflicts Weakness condition (20 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

335.name: Cleave
335.desc_full: Elite Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!10...26...30!] damage.

1402.name: Critical Chop
1402.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you inflict + [!5...17...20!] damage. If this attack results in a critical hit , target foe is interrupted.
1402.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Interrupts an action if you land a critical hit.

330.name: Cyclone Axe
330.desc_full: Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for + [!4...10...12!] damage to all adjacent opponents.
330.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!4...10...12!] damage to all foes adjacent to you.

1696.name: Decapitate
1696.desc_full: Elite Axe Attack. You lose all adrenaline and all Energy. If this attack hits, you deal + [!5...41...50!] damage and cause a Deep Wound for [!5...17...20!] seconds. This attack always results in a critical hit.
1696.desc_concise: Elite Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...41...50!] damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Automatic critical hit. You lose all adrenaline and Energy.

337.name: Dismember
337.desc_full: Axe Attack. If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe , lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
337.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

340.name: Disrupting Chop
340.desc_full: Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill , that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
340.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

338.name: Eviscerate
338.desc_full: Elite Axe Attack. If Eviscerate hits, you strike for + [!1...25...31!] damage and inflict a Deep Wound , lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
338.desc_concise: Elite Axe Attack. Deals + [!1...25...31!] damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

336.name: Executioner's Strike
336.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage.

904.name: Furious Axe
904.desc_full: Axe Attack. If Furious Axe hits, you strike for + [!5...29...35!] damage. If it is blocked you gain 3 strikes worth of adrenaline.
904.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...29...35!] damage. Gives you 3 strikes of adrenaline if blocked.

2009.name: Keen Chop
2009.desc_full: Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack always results in a critical hit.
2009.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Always a critical hit.

849.name: Lacerating Chop
849.desc_full: Axe Attack. If Lacerating Chop hits, you deal + [!5...17...20!] damage. If it strikes a knocked down foe your target suffers from Bleeding for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
849.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

339.name: Penetrating Blow
339.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.
339.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. 20% armor penetration.

1136.name: Penetrating Chop
1136.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.
1136.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. 20% armor penetration.

341.name: Swift Chop
341.desc_full: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!1...16...20!] damage. If Swift Chop is blocked , target foe takes [!1...16...20!] damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.
341.desc_concise: Axe Attack. Deals + [!1...16...20!] damage. Deals [!1...16...20!] damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (20 seconds) if blocked.

992.name: Triple Chop
992.desc_full: Elite Axe Attack. Attack target foe and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals + [!10...34...40!] damage.
992.desc_concise: Elite Axe Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. Also hits adjacent foes.

888.name: Whirling Axe
888.desc_full: Elite Axe Attack. If Whirling Axe hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
888.desc_concise: Elite Axe Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage and removes a stance. Unblockable.

905.name: Auspicious Blow
905.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If Auspicious Blow hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage and gain [!3...7...8!] Energy. If target foe is suffering from Weakness , this attack is unblockable.
905.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage and you gain [!3...7...8!] Energy. Unblockable if target foe is Weakened.

358.desc_concise: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals + [!1...16...20!] damage. Causes knockdown. Knockdown lasts 4 seconds with Strength 8 or higher.

350.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Blindness condition to adjacent foes ( [!3...6...7!] seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

357.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

353.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes for + [!1...16...20!] damage.

352.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!1...16...20!] damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe you inflict a Deep Wound , lowering your target 's maximum Health by 20% for [!5...17...20!] seconds.

355.desc_concise: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

354.desc_concise: Elite Hammer Attack. Knocks down target and adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Hammer Mastery is 5 or more.

993.desc_full: Elite Hammer Attack. If Enraged Smash hits, you gain [!1...3...4!] strike[s] of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe , you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage , and target foe is knocked down.

850.name: Fierce Blow
850.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If Fierce Blow hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage. If target foe was [ sic ] suffering from Weakness , that foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for [!1...7...8!] second[s].
850.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Inflicts Deep Wound ( [!1...7...8!] second[s]) if target foe is Weakened.

889.desc_concise: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals + [!10...26...30!] damage. Remove target foe's stance. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Unblockable.

331.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Lose all adrenaline.

359.name: Heavy Blow
359.desc_full: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If this attack hits a foe suffering from Weakness , that foe is knocked down and you strike for + [!1...24...30!] damage.
359.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!1...24...30!] damage and causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened. Lose all adrenaline.

356.name: Irresistible Blow
356.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked , your target is knocked down and takes [!5...17...20!] damage.
356.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Deals [!5...17...20!] damage and causes knock-down if blocked.

1697.name: Magehunter's Smash
1697.desc_full: Elite Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment , this attack cannot be blocked.
1697.desc_concise: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

351.name: Mighty Blow
351.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage.

1409.name: Mokele Smash
1409.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage and gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.
1409.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage and you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.

1410.name: Overbearing Smash
1410.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you deal + [!1...16...20!] damage. If target foe is knocked down , that foe is Dazed for [!1...7...8!] second[s].
1410.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!1...16...20!] damage. If target foe is knocked down, they are Dazed ( [!1...7...8!] second[s]).

2008.name: Pulverizing Smash
2008.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If you hit a knocked-down foe , that foe suffers from Weakness and a Deep Wound for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
2008.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Weakness and Deep Wound conditions ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

994.name: Renewing Smash
994.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If Renewing Smash hits, it deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe , you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.
994.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. You gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

360.name: Staggering Blow
360.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
360.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

1137.name: Yeti Smash
1137.desc_full: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. Attack all adjacent foes. If this attack strikes a foe suffering from a condition , that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)
1137.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes. Knocks down foes suffering from a condition. You lose all adrenaline. 50% failure chance unless Hammer Mastery is 5 or more.

2067.name: "I Meant to Do That!"
2067.desc_full: Shout. If you are knocked down , you gain [!1...4...5!] strikes of adrenaline.
2067.desc_concise: Shout. You gain [!1...4...5!] strikes of adrenaline if you are knocked-down.

333.name: "I Will Avenge You!"
333.desc_full: Shout. For each dead ally , you gain 10 seconds of + [!3...6...7!] Health regeneration and your attack speed increases by 25%.
333.desc_concise: Shout. You have + [!3...6...7!] Health regeneration and attack 25% faster (10 seconds for each dead ally).

368.name: "I Will Survive!"
368.desc_full: Shout. You gain +3 Health regeneration for each condition you are suffering. This regeneration expires after [!5...10...11!] seconds.
368.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each condition on you.

1141.name: "You Will Die!"
1141.desc_full: Shout. If target foe is below 50% Health , you gain [!1...3...3!] strike[s] of adrenaline.
1141.desc_concise: Shout.  You gain [!1...3...3!] strike[s] of adrenaline. No effect unless target foe is under 50% Health.

317.name: Battle Rage
317.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non- adrenal skills.
317.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) You move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from your attacks. Ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

370.name: Berserker Stance
370.desc_full: Stance. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Berserker Stance ends if you use a skill.
370.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Ends if you use a skill.

2197.name: Body Blow

2197.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. Inflicts Deep Wound ( [!0...12...15!] second[s]) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

379.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You move 33% faster. Causes knock-down if you hit a moving foe in melee. Ends if you use a skill.

332.name: Bull's Strike

332.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!5...25...30!] damage and causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

1413.name: Burst of Aggression

1413.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!2...8...10!] seconds.) You attack 33% faster. End effect: lose all adrenaline.

1405.name: Charging Strike
1405.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!1...8...10!] second[s], you run 33% faster. Your next successful melee hit does + [!10...34...40!] damage and this stance ends. This stance ends if you use a skill.
1405.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!1...8...10!] second[s].) You move 33% faster and deal + [!10...34...40!] damage with your next melee hit. Ends when you hit or if you use a skill.

1693.name: Counterattack
1693.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!5...29...35!] damage. If you hit an attacking foe , you gain [!2...5...6!] Energy.
1693.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!5...29...35!] damage. You gain [!2...5...6!] Energy if target foe is attacking.

318.name: Defy Pain
318.desc_full: Elite Skill. For 20 seconds you have an additional [!90...258...300!] Health , an additional 20 armor , and you take - [!1...8...10!] less damage.
318.desc_concise: Elite Skill. (20 seconds.) You have + [!90...258...300!] maximum Health, +20 armor, and take [!1...8...10!] less damage.

2066.name: Disarm

2066.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Interrupts target foe. Interruption effect: disables this foe's attack skills ( [!0...2...3!] second[s]) if that action was an attack.

361.name: Dolyak Signet

361.desc_concise: Signet. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) You have + [!10...34...40!] armor and cannot be knocked-down. You move 75% slower.

375.name: Dwarven Battle Stance

375.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt actions . No effect unless you have a hammer equipped.

347.name: Endure Pain

347.desc_concise: Skill. ( [!7...16...18!] seconds.) You have + [!90...258...300!] maximum Health.

1414.name: Enraging Charge

1414.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) You move 25% faster. Gain + [!0...2...3!] adrenaline on your next melee attack. Ends after your next hit.

1404.name: Flail

1404.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...12...15!] second[s].) You attack 33% faster. You move 33% slower.

389.name: Flourish

389.desc_concise: Elite Skill. Recharges your attack skills. You gain [!2...6...7!] Energy for each skill recharged.

327.name: Griffon's Sweep
327.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for [!+5...17...20!] damage. If this attack is blocked , your target is knocked down and suffers [!10...29...34!] damage.
327.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Causes knock-down and deals [!10...29...34!] damage if blocked.

1406.name: Headbutt

1406.desc_concise: Elite Touch Skill. Deals [!40...88...100!] damage. You are Dazed ( [![!5...17...20!]!] seconds).

1134.name: Leviathan's Sweep
1134.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!5...17...20!] damage. If this attack is blocked , your target is knocked down and suffers [!10...29...34!] damage.
1134.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Causes knock-down and deals [!10...29...34!] damage if blocked.

1407.name: Lion's Comfort
1407.desc_full: Skill. All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for [!50...98...110!] Health , and gain [!0...2...3!] strike[s] of adrenaline.
1407.desc_concise: Skill. You are healed for [!50...98...110!] and gain [!0...2...3!] strike[s] of adrenaline. Disables your signets (12 seconds).

1694.name: Magehunter Strike

1694.desc_concise: Elite Melee Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

322.name: Power Attack

831.name: Primal Rage

831.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!1...12...15!] second[s].) You attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. You take double damage.

326.name: Protector's Strike

326.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage if target is moving.

1408.desc_concise: Elite Skill. You gain [!1...6...7!] adrenaline. For 10 seconds, adrenal skills have a 5 second recharge when used.

363.name: Shield Bash

363.desc_concise: Skill. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You block the next attack skill. Causes knock-down and +15 second recharge if it was a melee skill. No effect unless you are wielding a shield.

1411.name: Signet of Stamina

1411.desc_concise: Signet. You have + [!50...250...300!] maximum Health. Ends if you hit with an attack.

944.desc_concise: Signet. Your attacks deal +5 damage. Ends after [![!1...13...16!]!] attack[s].

349.name: Sprint

995.name: Tiger Stance

995.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!4...9...10!] seconds.) You attack 33% faster. Ends if you fail to hit.

362.desc_concise: Skill. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) Your melee attacks are unblockable.

374.desc_concise: Elite Skill. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. No Energy gain if you have more than [![!10...22...25!]!] Energy.

1416.name: Barbarous Slice

1416.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!5...25...30!] damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition ( [!5...13...15!] seconds) if you are not in a stance.

1415.desc_concise: Elite Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition ( [!5...13...15!] seconds) and Bleeding condition ( [!10...22...25!] seconds).

907.name: Dragon Slash

385.name: Final Thrust
385.desc_full: Sword Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal [!1...32...40!] more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.
385.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!1...32...40!] damage. Deals + [!1...32...40!] more damage if target foe is below 50% Health. Lose all adrenaline.

383.name: Galrath Slash
383.desc_full: Sword Attack. This attack strikes for + [!1...32...40!] damage if it hits.

384.name: Gash
384.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe , you strike for [!5...17...20!] more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound , lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
384.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if your target is Bleeding.

320.name: Hamstring
320.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, your target is Crippled for [!3...13...15!] seconds, slowing his [ sic ] movement.
320.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition ( [!3...13...15!] seconds).

381.name: Hundred Blades
381.desc_full: Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword , all adjacent foes take [!10...22...25!] slashing damage.
381.desc_concise: Elite Skill. (15 seconds.) Deals [!10...22...25!] slashing damage to all adjacent foes whenever you attack with a sword.

1135.name: Jaizhenju Strike
1135.desc_full: Sword Attack. If Jaizhenju Strike hits, you strike for + [!1...24...30!] damage. If you are not using a stance , Jaizhenju Strike cannot be blocked.
1135.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!1...24...30!] damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

2010.name: Knee Cutter
2010.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Crippled foe , you gain [!2...6...7!] Energy and [!1...3...3!] strikes [ sic ] of adrenaline.
2010.desc_concise: Sword Attack. You gain [!2...6...7!] Energy and [!1...3...3!] adrenaline if target foe is Crippled.

328.name: Pure Strike
328.desc_full: Sword Attack. If Pure Strike hits, you strike for + [!1...24...30!] damage. If you are not using a stance , Pure Strike cannot be blocked.
328.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!1...24...30!] damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

892.name: Quivering Blade
892.desc_full: Elite Sword Attack. If Quivering Blade hits, you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage. If this attack hits a moving foe , that foe is Dazed for 5 seconds.
892.desc_concise: Elite Sword Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (5 seconds) if target foe was moving.

390.name: Savage Slash
390.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe 's action. If that action was a spell , you deal [!1...32...40!] extra damage.
390.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals + [!1...32...40!] damage if action was a spell.

386.name: Seeking Blade
386.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits you strike for + [!1...16...20!] damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked , your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes [!1...16...20!] damage.
386.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!1...16...20!] damage. Deals [!1...16...20!] damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (25 seconds) if blocked.

382.name: Sever Artery
382.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for [!5...21...25!] seconds, losing Health over time.
382.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition ( [!5...21...25!] seconds).

1144.name: Silverwing Slash
1144.desc_full: Sword Attack. This attack strikes for + [!1...32...40!] damage if it hits.

996.name: Standing Slash
996.desc_full: Sword Attack. If it hits, Standing Slash deals + [!5...17...20!] damage plus an additional [!5...17...20!] damage if you are in a stance.
996.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Deals [!5...17...20!] more damage if you are in a stance.

1702.name: Steelfang Slash
1702.desc_full: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, you deal + [!1...25...31!] damage. If you hit a foe that is knocked down , you gain [!1...4...5!] adrenaline.
1702.desc_concise: Sword Attack. Deals + [!1...25...31!] damage. You gain [!1...4...5!] adrenaline if target foe is knocked down.

851.name: Sun and Moon Slash
851.desc_full: Sword Attack. Attack target foe twice. These attacks cannot be blocked.
851.desc_concise: Sword Attack. You attack target foe twice. Unblockable.

364.name: "Charge!"
364.desc_full: Elite Shout. Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For [!5...11...13!] seconds, these allies move 33% faster.
364.desc_concise: Elite Shout. ( [!5...11...13!] seconds.) Allies in earshot move 33% faster. Initial effect : these allies lose the Crippled condition.

366.name: "Fear Me!"
366.desc_full: Shout. All nearby foes lose [!1...3...4!] Energy. For [!1...12...15!] second[s], your melee attacks gain + [!5...25...30!] % chance of a critical hit against stationary foes.
366.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!1...12...15!] second[s].) You have + [!5...25...30!] % chance of a critical hit with melee attacks against stationary foes. Initial effect: nearby foes lose [!1...3...4!] Energy.

891.name: "None Shall Pass!"
891.desc_full: Shout. All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges [!1...7...8!] second[s] faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).
891.desc_concise: Shout. Knocks down all nearby moving foes. Recharges [!1...7...8!] second[s] faster for each affected foe (maximum 25 seconds).

839.name: "Retreat!"
839.desc_full: Shout. If there are any dead allies within earshot , your party moves 33% faster for [!5...10...11!] seconds.
839.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) Party members in earshot move 33% faster. No effect unless there are dead allies within earshot.

367.name: "Shields Up!"
367.desc_full: Shout. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you and all party members within earshot gain +60 armor against incoming projectile attacks.
367.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) Party members in earshot have +60 armor against projectile attacks.

316.name: "To the Limit!"
316.desc_full: Shout. For each foe within earshot (maximum [!1...5...6!] ), you gain one strike of adrenaline. For [!10...18...20!] seconds, your maximum Health is increased by [!10...50...60!].
316.desc_concise: Shout.  ( [!10...18...20!] seconds.)  You have + [!10...50...60!] maximum Health.  Initial effect: you gain one strike of adrenaline for each foe within earshot (maximum [!1...5...6!] ).

365.name: "Victory Is Mine!"
365.desc_full: Elite Shout. You gain [!10...56...68!] Health and [!3...6...7!] Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.
365.desc_concise: Elite Shout. You gain [!10...56...68!] Health and [!3...6...7!] Energy for each condition on target foe.

348.name: "Watch Yourself!"
348.desc_full: Shout. Party members within earshot gain + [!5...21...25!] armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.
348.desc_concise: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have + [!5...21...25!] armor. Ends after 10 incoming attacks.

1142.name: Auspicious Parry
1142.desc_full: Elite Stance. For 8 seconds, the next attack against you is blocked. You gain [!1...3...4!] strike[s] of adrenaline when this stance ends.
1142.desc_concise: Elite Stance. (8 seconds.) Blocks one attack. End effect: you gain [!1...3...4!] strike[s] of adrenaline.

371.name: Balanced Stance
371.desc_full: Stance. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.
371.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) You cannot be knocked-down and do not take extra damage from critical hits.

380.name: Bonetti's Defense
380.desc_full: Stance. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. You gain 5 Energy for each successful melee attack blocked. Bonetti's Defense ends if you use a skill.
380.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Gain 5 Energy for each melee attack blocked. Ends if you use a skill.

388.name: Deadly Riposte
388.desc_full: Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you, and your attacker is struck for [!15...75...90!] damage and begins Bleeding for [!3...21...25!] seconds.
388.desc_concise: Skill. (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes [!15...75...90!] damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition. ( [!3...21...25!] seconds). No effect unless you have a sword equipped.

345.name: Defensive Stance
345.desc_full: Stance. For [!1...4...5!] second[s], you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum [!0...3...4!] ).
345.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...4...5!] second[s].) You have 75% chance to block. End effect: gain one adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum [![!0...3...4!]!] ).

373.name: Deflect Arrows
373.desc_full: Stance. For [!1...5...6!] second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. If you block a projectile attack , adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding for [!5...13...15!] seconds.
373.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...5...6!] second[s].) You have 75% chance to block attacks. Adjacent foes suffer Bleeding ( [!5...13...15!] seconds) when you block a projectile attack.

323.name: Desperation Blow
323.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage , and your target suffers from one of the following conditions : Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.
323.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds), Weakness (20 seconds), Bleeding (25 seconds), or Crippled (15 seconds). You are knocked-down.

376.name: Disciplined Stance
376.desc_full: Stance. For [!1...3...4!] second[s], you gain +10 armor and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Disciplined Stance ends if you use an adrenal skill.
376.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...3...4!] second[s].) You have 75% chance to block and +10 armor. Ends if you use an adrenal skill.

1133.name: Drunken Blow
1133.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions : Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.
1133.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds), Weakness (20 seconds), Bleeding (25 seconds), or Crippled (15 seconds). You are knocked-down.

372.name: Gladiator's Defense
372.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Whenever you block a melee attack this way, the attacker suffers [!5...29...35!] damage.
372.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Your attacker takes [!5...29...35!] damage whenever you block a melee attack this way.

1.name: Healing Signet
1.desc_full: Signet. You gain [!82...154...172!] Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.
1.desc_concise: Signet. You gain [!82...154...172!] Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

810.name: Protector's Defense
810.desc_full: Skill. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, allies adjacent to you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Protector's Defense ends if you move.
810.desc_concise: Skill. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) Allies adjacent to you have 75% chance to block. Ends if you move.

387.name: Riposte
387.desc_full: Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you and your attacker is struck for [!20...68...80!] damage.
387.desc_concise: Skill. (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes [!20...68...80!] damage. No effect unless you have a sword equipped.

378.name: Shield Stance
378.desc_full: Stance. For [!1...5...6!] second[s], while wielding a shield , you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks , and damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction ).
378.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...5...6!] second[s].) You have 75% chance to block. Damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction). No effect unless you have a shield equipped.

1146.name: Shove
1146.desc_full: Elite Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down. If that foe was moving , that foe's stance ends and that foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage before being knocked down.
1146.desc_concise: Elite Touch Skill. Causes knockdown. Initial effect: ends foe's stance and deals [!15...63...75!] damage if target foe is moving.

1699.name: Soldier's Defense
1699.desc_full: Stance. For [!1...5...6!] second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks while under the effects of a shout or chant. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each blocked attack.
1699.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...5...6!] second[s].) You have 75% chance to block while under the effects of a shout or chant. Block effect: gain 1 adrenaline.

2196.name: Soldier's Speed
2196.desc_full: Stance. For [!3...15...18!] seconds, you move 15% faster. You move an additional 15% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.
2196.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!3...15...18!] seconds.) You move 15% faster and an additional 15% while affected by a chant or shout.

1698.name: Soldier's Stance
1698.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
1698.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.

1695.name: Soldier's Strike
1695.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal + [!10...34...40!] more damage. If you are under the effects of a chant or shout , this attack cannot be blocked.
1695.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage. Unblockable if you are under the effects of a chant or shout.

1701.name: Steady Stance
1701.desc_full: Elite Stance. For 10 seconds, the next time you would be knocked down , you gain [!1...3...3!] strike[s] of adrenaline and [!1...6...7!] Energy instead.
1701.desc_concise: Elite Stance. (10 seconds.) The next time you would be knocked-down, you gain [!1...3...3!] adrenaline and [!1...6...7!] Energy instead.

324.name: Thrill of Victory
324.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this blow hits, you deal + [!20...36...40!] damage. If you have more Health than target foe , you gain [!1...2...2!] strike[s] of adrenaline.
324.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!20...36...40!] damage. If you have more Health than your target, you gain [!1...2...2!] adrenaline.

377.name: Wary Stance
377.desc_full: Stance. For [!1...5...6!] second[s], you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.
377.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!1...5...6!] second[s]). You block attack skills. Gain adrenaline and 5 Energy for each block. Ends if you use a skill.

869.name: "Coward!"
869.desc_full: Elite Shout. If target foe is moving , that foe is knocked down.
869.desc_concise: Elite Shout. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

343.name: "For Great Justice!"
343.desc_full: Shout. For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline , you gain 100% more.
343.desc_concise: Shout. (20 seconds.) You gain 100% more adrenaline.

1014.name: "Let's Get 'Em!"
1014.desc_full: Shout. For 5 seconds, all allies within earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.
1014.desc_concise: Shout. (5 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.

906.name: "On Your Knees!"
906.desc_full: Shout. Lose all adrenaline. If any adjacent foes are knocked down , all of your stances are recharged.
906.desc_concise: Shout. Recharges all your stances if you are adjacent to a knocked-down foe. You lose all adrenaline.

1412.name: "You're All Alone!"
1412.desc_full: Elite Shout. If target foe isn't near an ally , that foe suffers from Cripple and Weakness for 8 seconds.
1412.desc_concise: Elite Shout. Inflicts Cripple and Weakness conditions (8 seconds). No effect if target foe is near one of its allies.

325.name: Distracting Blow
325.desc_full: Melee Attack. Swipe your weapon at the target , dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).
325.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Also attacks foes adjacent to your target. Interrupts an action. Hits for no damage.

2194.name: Distracting Strike
2194.desc_full: Melee Attack. If Distracting Strike hits, it deals no damage and interrupts target foe 's action. If target foe has Cracked Armor , that skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
2194.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: Disables interrupted skill (20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor. Deals no damage.

344.name: Flurry
344.desc_full: Stance. For 5 seconds, your attack rate is increased by 33% , but you deal 25% less damage.
344.desc_concise: Stance. (5 seconds). You attack 33% faster. You do 25% less damage.

1700.name: Frenzied Defense
1700.desc_full: Stance. For 8 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks , but take double damage.
1700.desc_concise: Stance. (8 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. You take double damage.

346.name: Frenzy
346.desc_full: Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.
346.desc_concise: Stance. (8 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. You take double damage.

2011.name: Grapple
2011.desc_full: Skill. You and target touched foe are knocked down. You lose your current stance.
2011.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Causes knockdown. You are also knocked down. Your current stance ends.

329.name: Skull Crack
329.desc_full: Elite Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target 's current action. If that foe was casting a spell , that foe is Dazed for 10 seconds.
329.desc_concise: Elite Melee Attack. Interrupts an action. Inflicts Dazed condition (10 seconds) if target is casting a spell.

1140.name: Storm of Swords
1140.desc_full: Skill. For 15 seconds, you and all adjacent allies deal 25 damage to all adjacent foes each second.
1140.desc_concise: Skill. (15 seconds.) Affects you and all adjacent allies. Deals 25 damage to all adjacent foes each second.

2195.name: Symbolic Strike
2195.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +12 damage for each signet you have equipped (maximum 70 damage).
2195.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals +12 damage (maximum 70) for each signet you have equipped.

321.name: Wild Blow
321.desc_full: Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
321.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Always a critical hit. Removes a stance. Unblockable. Lose all adrenaline.

1209.name: Bestial Fury
1209.desc_full: Stance. All your non- attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you attack 25% faster.
1209.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You attack 25% faster. Your non-attack skills are disabled (5 seconds).

1203.name: Bestial Mauling
1203.desc_full: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals [!+5...17...20!] damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe , that foe is Dazed for [!4...9...10!] seconds.
1203.desc_concise: Pet Attack. Deals +[!5...17...20!] damage. Inflicts Dazed condition ( [!4...9...10!] seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

437.name: Bestial Pounce
437.desc_full: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Pounce that deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell , that foe is knocked down.
437.desc_concise: Pet Attack. Deals +[!5...17...20!] damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is casting a spell.

444.name: Brutal Strike
444.desc_full: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Brutal Strike that deals + [!5...29...35!] damage. If that attack strikes a foe whose Health is below 50%, that foe takes an additional + [!5...29...35!] damage.
444.desc_concise: Pet Attack. Deals + [!5...29...35!] damage. Deals + [!5...29...35!] more damage if target foe is under 50% health.

415.name: Call of Haste
415.desc_full: Shout. For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 33% faster attack speed and moves 33% faster.
415.desc_concise: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 33% faster.

412.name: Call of Protection
412.desc_full: Shout. For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a [!5...17...20!] base damage reduction.
412.desc_concise: Shout. (120 seconds.) Your pet has [!5...17...20!] damage reduction.

411.name: Charm Animal
411.desc_full: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.
411.desc_concise: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.

436.name: Comfort Animal
436.desc_full: Skill. You heal your animal companion for [!20...87...104!] Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with [!10...48...58!] % Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.
436.desc_concise: Skill. Your pet gains [!20...87...104!] Health. Resurrects your pet ( [!10...48...58!] % Health.) If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

2141.name: Companionship
2141.desc_full: Skill. If you have less Health than your pet , you are healed for [!30...102...120!] Health. If your pet has less Health than you, it is healed for [!30...102...120!] Health.
2141.desc_concise: Skill. Heals you for [!30...102...120!] if you have less Health than your pet. Heals your pet for [!30...102...120!] if it has less Health than you.

445.name: Disrupting Lunge
445.desc_full: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Disrupting Lunge that deals + [!1...10...12!] damage. If that attack strikes a foe using a skill that skill is interrupted and is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
445.desc_concise: Pet Attack. Deals + [!1...10...12!] damage. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

464.name: Edge of Extinction
464.desc_full: Nature Ritual. Create a level [!1...8...10!] spirit. If a non-spirit creature within range dies , Edge of Extinction deals [!14...43...50!] damage to all creatures of the same type that are below 90% Health and within range of the spirit. This spirit dies after [!30...126...150!] seconds.
464.desc_concise: Nature Ritual. Creates a level [!1...8...10!] spirit ( [!30...126...150!] second lifespan). Deals [!14...43...50!] damage to creatures in its range whenever a creature of the same type dies. Does not affect spirits. No damage to creatures above 90% Health.

474.name: Energizing Wind
474.desc_full: Nature Ritual. Create a level [!1...5...6!] spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range , all skills cost 15 less Energy (minimum cost 10 Energy), and skills recharge 25% slower. This spirit dies after [!1...25...31!] second[s].
474.desc_concise: Nature Ritual. Creates a level [!1...5...6!] spirit ( [!1...25...31!] second[s] lifespan). Skills cost 15 less energy (minimum cost 10 energy) and recharge 25% slower for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

1202.name: Enraged Lunge
1202.desc_full: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for [!5...17...20!] seconds and deals + [!10...42...50!] damage.
1202.desc_concise: Elite Pet Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) and deals + [!10...42...50!] damage.

2142.name: Feral Aggression
2142.desc_full: Skill. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, your pet attacks 33% faster and deals + [!3...9...10!] additional damage.
2142.desc_concise: Skill. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Your pet attacks 33% faster and deals + [!3...9...10!] damage.

439.name: Feral Lunge
439.desc_full: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Feral Lunge that deals + [!5...29...35!] damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is attacking, that foe suffers from Bleeding for [!5...21...25!] seconds.
439.desc_concise: Pet Attack. Deals +[!5...29...35!] damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if target foe is attacking ( [!5...21...25!] seconds).

442.name: Ferocious Strike
442.desc_full: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals + [!13...25...28!] damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and [!3...9...10!] Energy.
442.desc_concise: Elite Pet Attack. Deals + [!13...25...28!] damage. You gain adrenaline and [!3...9...10!] energy.

467.name: Fertile Season
467.desc_full: Nature Ritual. Create a level [!1...8...10!] spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range have + [!50...130...150!] maximum Health and gain +8 armor. This spirit dies after [!15...39...45!] seconds.
