830.name: Ray of Judgment
830.desc_full: Elite Spell. Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to this location take [!5...37...45!] holy damage each second and begin Burning for [!1...3...3!] second[s].
830.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!5...37...45!] holy damage and inflicts Burning ( [!1...3...3!] second[s]) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

248.name: Retribution
248.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage , this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum [!5...17...20!] damage).
248.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Deals 33% of each attack's damage (maximum [!5...17...20!] ) back to the source.

1400.name: Reversal of Damage
1400.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage , the foe dealing the damage takes that damage instead (maximum [!5...61...75!] ).
1400.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Negates the next damage and hits the source for that same amount (maximum [!5...61...75!] ).

1398.name: Scourge Enchantment
1398.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, each time target foe is the target of an enchantment , the caster of that enchantment takes [!15...63...75!] damage.
1398.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals [!15...63...75!] damage to anyone casting an enchantment on target foe.

251.name: Scourge Healing
251.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed , the healer takes [!15...67...80!] holy damage.
251.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Whenever target foe is healed, the healer takes [!15...67...80!] holy damage.

253.name: Scourge Sacrifice
253.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, every time target foe and adjacent foes sacrifice life, they sacrifice twice the normal amount.
253.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target ( [!8...18...20!] seconds). Doubles Health sacrifice.

262.name: Shield of Judgment
262.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, anyone striking target ally with an attack is knocked down and suffers [!5...41...50!] holy damage.
262.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Deals [!5...41...50!] holy damage to foes attacking [ sic ] target ally. Causes knock-down.

294.name: Signet of Judgment
294.desc_full: Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take [!15...63...75!] holy damage.
294.desc_concise: Elite Signet. Knocks down target. Deals [!15...63...75!] holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

1689.name: Signet of Mystic Wrath
1689.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!5...29...35!] holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).
1689.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!5...29...35!] holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).

1269.name: Signet of Rage
1269.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!5...41...50!] holy damage and + [!5...9...10!] holy damage for each adrenaline skill that foe has.
1269.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!5...41...50!] holy damage. Deals [!5...9...10!] more holy damage for each of target foe's adrenaline skills.

240.name: Smite
240.desc_full: Spell. This attack [ sic ] deals [!10...46...55!] Holy [ sic ] damage. If attacking , your target takes an additional [!10...30...35!] Holy [ sic ] damage.
240.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...46...55!] holy damage. Deals [!10...30...35!] more holy damage if target is attacking.

2004.name: Smite Condition
2004.desc_full: Spell. Remove one condition from target ally. If a condition was removed, foes in the area take [!10...50...60!] holy damage.
2004.desc_concise: Spell. Removes a condition. Removal effect: deals [!10...50...60!] holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

302.name: Smite Hex
302.desc_full: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes in the area suffer [!10...70...85!] holy damage.
302.desc_concise: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals [!10...70...85!] holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

1130.name: Spear of Light
1130.desc_full: Spell. Spear of Light flies toward target foe and deals [!26...50...56!] holy damage if it hits. Spear of Light deals + [!15...51...60!] damage if it hits an attacking foe.
1130.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!26...50...56!] holy damage. Deals [!15...51...60!] more damage if target foe is attacking.

1131.name: Stonesoul Strike
1131.desc_full: Skill. Touched target foe takes [!10...46...55!] holy damage. If knocked down , your target takes an additional [!10...46...55!] holy damage.
1131.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!10...46...55!] holy damage. Deals [!10...46...55!] more holy damage if target is knocked down.

243.name: Strength of Honor
243.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals [!5...21...25!] more damage in melee.
243.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals [!5...21...25!] more damage in melee.

247.name: Symbol of Wrath
247.desc_full: Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take [!8...27...32!] holy damage each second.
247.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!8...27...32!] holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location.

1129.name: Word of Censure
1129.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe takes [!15...63...75!] holy damage. If your target was below 33% Health , Word of Censure takes 20 additional seconds to recharge.
1129.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!15...63...75!] holy damage. +20 recharge time if target foe is below 33% Health.

271.name: Zealot's Fire
271.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets an ally , all foes adjacent to that target are struck for [!5...29...35!] fire damage and you lose 1 Energy.
271.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you use a skill on an ally, all foes adjacent to that ally are hit for [!5...29...35!] fire damage. Damage cost: you lose 1 Energy.

2683.name: Castigation Signet (Saul D'Alessio)
2683.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!56...58...60!] holy damage. If that foe was attacking , you gain [!10...11...11!] Energy.
2683.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!56...58...60!] holy damage. You gain [!10...11...11!] Energy if target foe is attacking.

1126.name: Empathic Removal
1126.desc_full: Elite Spell. You and target other ally lose 1 condition and 1 hex , and are healed for 50.
1126.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Removes one condition and hex from target ally and yourself, and heals for 50. Cannot self-target.

250.name: Essence Bond
250.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage , you gain 1 Energy.
250.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. You gain 1 Energy whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage.

309.name: Holy Veil
309.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, any hex cast on target ally takes twice as long to cast. When Holy Veil ends, one hex is removed from target ally.
309.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Doubles casting time of hexes cast on target ally. End effect: removes a hex.

304.name: Light of Dwayna
304.desc_full: Spell. Resurrect all dead party members in the area. They are returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
304.desc_concise: Spell. Resurrects all dead party members in the area. (25% Health, zero Energy).

298.name: Martyr
298.desc_full: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.
298.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions from all allies to you.

278.name: Purge Conditions
278.desc_full: Spell. Remove all conditions ( Poison , Disease , Blindness , Dazed , Bleeding , Crippled , Burning , Weakness , Cracked Armor , and Deep Wound ) from target ally.

295.name: Purge Signet
295.desc_full: Signet. Remove all hexes and conditions from target ally. You lose 10 Energy for each hex and each condition removed.
295.desc_concise: Signet. Removes all hexes and conditions. Removal cost: 10 Energy each.

301.name: Remove Hex
301.desc_full: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally.
301.desc_concise: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally.

305.name: Resurrect
305.desc_full: Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
305.desc_concise: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health, 0 Energy).

1690.name: Signet of Removal
1690.desc_full: Elite Signet. If target ally is under the effects of an enchantment , that ally loses one hex and one condition.
1690.desc_concise: Elite Signet. Removes one hex and one condition. No effect unless target ally is enchanted.

308.name: Succor
308.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this Enchantment, target other ally gains +1 Health and +1 Energy regeneration , but you lose 1 Energy each time that ally casts a Spell.
308.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. +1 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target. You lose 1 Energy each time target ally casts a spell.

315.name: Vengeance
315.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. For 30 seconds, that party member deals 25% more damage. When this enchantment ends, target party member dies. Deaths while under the effects of this enchantment do not incur a death penalty.
315.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). This ally deals 25% more damage and does not incur death penalty. End effect: this ally dies.

111.name: Awaken the Blood
111.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!20...39...44!] seconds, you gain +2 Blood Magic and +2 Curses , but whenever you sacrifice Health , you sacrifice 50% more than the normal amount.
111.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!20...39...44!] seconds.) You have +2 Blood Magic and Curses. Sacrifice 50% more Health than normal.

131.name: Barbed Signet
131.desc_full: Signet. You inflict Bleeding for [!3...13...15!] seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes.
131.desc_concise: Signet. Target and adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding ( [!3...13...15!] seconds).

835.name: Blood Bond
835.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!3...10...12!] seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Blood Bond. Whenever an ally hits one of them with an attack , that ally gains [!5...17...20!] Health. If one of these foes dies while hexed, all allies adjacent to that foe are healed for [!20...84...100!] Health.
835.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target ( [!3...10...12!] seconds). Allies hitting these foes gain [!5...17...20!] health. If any of these foes dies while hexed, adjacent allies are healed for [!20...84...100!] .

1076.name: Blood Drinker
1076.desc_full: Spell. If your Health is above 50%, you begin Bleeding for 10 seconds. Steal up to [!20...56...65!] Health from target foe.
1076.desc_concise: Spell. Steals [!20...56...65!] Health. You begin Bleeding (10 seconds) if your Health is above 50%.

119.name: Blood is Power
119.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target other ally gains + [!3...5...6!] Energy regeneration.
119.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) + [!3...5...6!] Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

902.name: Blood of the Aggressor
902.desc_full: Spell. Steal up to [!5...37...45!] Health from target foe. If that foe was attacking , that foe suffers Weakness for [!3...10...12!] seconds.
902.desc_concise: Spell. Steal [!5...37...45!] Health. Inflicts Weakness ( [!3...10...12!] seconds) if target foe was attacking.

115.name: Blood Renewal
115.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you gain + [!3...5...6!] Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain [!40...160...190!] Health.
115.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You have + [!3...5...6!] Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for [!40...160...190!] .

157.name: Blood Ritual
157.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!8...13...14!] seconds, target touched ally gains +3 Energy regeneration. Blood Ritual cannot be used on the caster.
157.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...13...14!] seconds.) +3 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

806.name: Cultist's Fervor
806.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds and 3 seconds longer for every rank of Soul Reaping , your Necromancer spells cost - [!1...5...6!] Energy to cast but you suffer from Bleeding for 10 seconds each time you cast a Necromancer spell.
806.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds plus 3 seconds more for every rank of Soul Reaping.) Your Necromancer spells cost [!1...5...6!] less Energy. You suffer from Bleeding (10 seconds) each time you cast a Necromancer spell.

138.name: Dark Bond
138.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For the next [!30...54...60!] seconds, whenever you receive damage , your closest minion suffers 75% of that damage for you.
138.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!30...54...60!] seconds.) Transfers 75% of incoming damage from you to your nearest servant.

147.name: Dark Fury
147.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever any party member hits with an attack , that party member gains one hit of adrenaline. (50% failure chance with Blood Magic of 4 or less.)
147.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Enchants party members (5 seconds). These party members gain one strike of adrenaline each time they hit with an attack. 50% failure chance unless Blood Magic 5 or more.

133.name: Dark Pact
133.desc_full: Spell. Deal [!10...40...48!] shadow damage to target foe.

130.name: Demonic Flesh
130.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!30...54...60!] seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets a foe , you deal [!5...17...20!] shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.
130.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!30...54...60!] seconds.) When using a skill on a foe, deal [!5...17...20!] shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

763.name: Jaundiced Gaze
763.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, for the next [!1...12...15!] second[s], your next enchantment spell casts [!0...1...1!] second[s] faster and costs [!1...8...10!] less Energy.
763.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: your next enchantment casts [!0...1...1!] second[s] faster and costs [!1...8...10!] less Energy. ( [!1...12...15!] second[s])

109.name: Life Siphon
109.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!12...22...24!] seconds, target foe suffers - [!1...3...3!] Health degeneration , and you gain + [!1...3...3!] Health regeneration.
109.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!12...22...24!] seconds.) Target foe has - [!1...3...3!] Health degeneration. You have + [!1...3...3!] Health regeneration.

126.name: Life Transfer
126.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!6...11...12!] seconds, target foe and adjacent foes suffer - [!3...7...8!] Health degeneration , which you gain as Health regeneration.
126.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target ( [!6...11...12!] second). Causes - [!3...7...8!] Health degeneration. You have + [!3...7...8!] Health regeneration.

1067.name: Lifebane Strike
1067.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!12...41...48!] shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to [!12...41...48!] Health.
1067.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!12...41...48!] damage. Steals [!12...41...48!] Health if target foe's Health is above 50%.

1360.name: Mark of Fury
1360.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, allies hitting target foe gain [!0...2...2!] strike[s] of adrenaline. When this hex ends, that foe suffers from Cracked Armor for [!1...12...15!] second[s].
1360.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Allies hitting target foe gain [!0...2...2!] strike[s] of adrenaline. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor ( [!1...12...15!] second[s].)

127.name: Mark of Subversion
127.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally of that foe, the spell fails and you steal up to [!10...76...92!] Health from that foe.
127.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal [!10...76...92!] Health. No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.

864.name: Oppressive Gaze
864.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and adjacent foes take [!10...26...30!] shadow damage. Foes already suffering from a condition are Poisoned and Weakened for [!3...10...12!] seconds.
864.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...26...30!] damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Poison and Weakness ( [!3...10...12!] second) on foes suffering from a condition.

134.name: Order of Pain
134.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage , that party member does + [!3...13...16!] damage.
134.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). [!3...13...16!] more damage whenever these party members hit with physical damage.

148.name: Order of the Vampire
148.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member who is not under the effects of another Necromancer enchantment hits a foe with physical damage , that party member steals up to [!3...13...16!] Health.
148.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds.) These party members steal [!3...13...16!] Health with each physical damage attack. Party members under another Necromancer enchantment are not affected.

862.name: Ravenous Gaze
862.desc_full: Elite Spell. Deal [!15...27...30!] damage and steal [!15...27...30!] Health from target foe and all nearby foes.
862.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!15...27...30!] damage and steals [!15...27...30!] Health from target and nearby foes.

102.name: Shadow Strike
102.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!12...41...48!] shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to [!12...41...48!] Health.
102.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!12...41...48!] damage. Steal up to [!12...41...48!] Health if this foe was above 50% Health.

145.name: Signet of Agony
145.desc_full: Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take [!10...58...70!] damage.
145.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!10...58...70!] damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

1364.name: Signet of Suffering
1364.desc_full: Elite Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 6 seconds. The next Necromancer skill that targets a foe causes Bleeding for [!2...13...16!] seconds.
1364.desc_concise: Elite Signet. You Bleed for 6 seconds.  Applies Bleeding ( [!2...13...16!] seconds) to the target of your next Necromancer skill.

128.name: Soul Leech
128.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell , you steal up to [!16...67...80!] Health from that foe.
128.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Steal [!16...67...80!] Health whenever target foe casts a spell.

1066.name: Spoil Victor
1066.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!3...13...15!] seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health , that foe loses [!25...85...100!] Health.
1066.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!3...13...15!] seconds.) Causes [!25...85...100!] Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

143.name: Strip Enchantment
143.desc_full: Spell. Remove [!0...2...2!] enchantment [s] from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you steal [!5...53...65!] Health.
143.desc_concise: Spell. Removes [!0...2...2!] enchantment[s] from target foe. Removal effect: you steal [!5...53...65!] Health.

158.name: Touch of Agony
158.desc_full: Skill. Target touched foe takes [!20...50...58!] shadow damage.

110.name: Unholy Feast
110.desc_full: Spell. Steal up to [!10...54...65!] Health from up to [!1...3...4!] foes [ sic ] in the area.
110.desc_concise: Spell. Steals [!10...54...65!] Health from [!1...3...4!] foe[s] in the area around you.

1077.name: Vampiric Bite
1077.desc_full: Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to [!29...65...74!] Health.

153.name: Vampiric Gaze
153.desc_full: Spell. Steal up to [!18...52...60!] Health from target foe.

819.name: Vampiric Spirit
819.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal up to [!5...41...50!] Health from target foe. For 10 seconds, you have + [!5...9...10!] Health regeneration.
819.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal [!5...41...50!] Health from target foe. You have + [!5...9...10!] Health regeneration (10 seconds).

1075.name: Vampiric Swarm
1075.desc_full: Spell. Vampiric Swarm steals up to [!15...51...60!] Health from up to three foes in the area.
1075.desc_concise: Spell. Steals [!15...51...60!] Health. Hits 2 additional foes in the area.

156.name: Vampiric Touch
156.desc_full: Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to [!29...65...74!] Health.

1078.name: Wallow's Bite
1078.desc_full: Skill. Target touched foe takes [!20...50...58!] damage.

92.name: Well of Blood
92.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Blood at its location. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, allies in that area receive + [!1...5...6!] Health regeneration.
92.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Allies in this well have + [!1...5...6!] Health regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

91.name: Well of Power
91.desc_full: Elite Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Power at that location. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, allies within the area of Well of Power gain + [!1...5...6!] Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration.
91.desc_concise: Elite Well Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Allies in this well have + [!1...5...6!] Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

2237.name: Atrophy
2237.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!3...6...7!] seconds, target foe 's primary attribute is reduced to 0.
2237.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!3...6...7!] seconds.) Reduces this foe's primary attribute to 0.

101.name: Barbs
101.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes [!1...12...15!] more damage when hit by physical damage.
101.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe takes [!1...12...15!] damage whenever it takes physical damage.

1998.name: Cacophony
1998.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe uses a shout or chant , that foe takes [!35...91...105!] damage.
1998.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Deals [!35...91...105!] damage whenever target foe uses a shout or chant.

144.name: Chilblains
144.desc_full: Spell. You become Poisoned for 10 seconds. Foes in the area of your target are struck for [!10...37...44!] cold damage and lose [!1...2...2!] enchantment [s].
144.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...37...44!] cold damage to foes in the area around your target; removes [!1...2...2!] enchantment[s] from these foes. You are Poisoned (10 seconds).

1362.name: Corrupt Enchantment
1362.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe suffers from - [!1...7...8!] Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
1362.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: - [!1...7...8!] Health degeneration (10 seconds).

2188.name: Defile Defenses
2188.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, the next time target foe blocks , that foe takes [!30...102...120!] damage.
2188.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Deals [!30...102...120!] damage the next time target foe blocks.

1070.name: Defile Enchantments
1070.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take [!6...49...60!] shadow damage and [!4...17...20!] shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
1070.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!6...49...60!] damage to target and nearby foes. Deals [!4...17...20!] more damage for each enchantment on them.

129.name: Defile Flesh
129.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...29...35!] seconds, target foe gains only two-thirds Health from healing.
129.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) Reduces healing target foe receives by 33%. Only skills with the word "heal" in the description are affected.

820.name: Depravity
820.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell , that foe and one nearby foe lose [!1...4...5!] Energy.
820.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Causes [!1...4...5!] Energy loss whenever target foe casts a spell. One foe near your target also loses Energy.

112.name: Desecrate Enchantments
112.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take [!6...49...60!] shadow damage and [!4...17...20!] shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
112.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!6...49...60!] damage to target and nearby foes. Deals [!4...17...20!] more damage for each enchantment on them.

117.name: Enfeeble
117.desc_full: Spell. Target suffers from Weakness for [!10...26...30!] seconds.

118.name: Enfeebling Blood
118.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
118.desc_concise: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

1079.name: Enfeebling Touch
1079.desc_full: Skill. Target touched foe loses [!5...41...50!] Health and suffers from Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
1079.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Causes [!5...41...50!] Health loss. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

936.name: Envenom Enchantments
936.desc_full: Spell. Target foe loses one enchantment. For every remaining enchantment, target foe is poisoned for [!3...9...10!] seconds.
936.desc_concise: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( [!3...9...10!] seconds for each remaining enchantment on that foe).

135.name: Faintheartedness
135.desc_full: Hex Spell. For the next [!3...13...16!] seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower , and that foe suffers - [!0...2...3!] Health degeneration.
135.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!3...13...16!] seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has - [!0...2...3!] Health degeneration.

151.name: Feast of Corruption
151.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for [!16...67...80!] shadow damage. You steal up to [!8...34...40!] Health from each struck foe who is suffering from a hex.
151.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!16...67...80!] damage to target and adjacent foes. Steal [!8...34...40!] Health from each hexed foe.

123.name: Insidious Parasite
123.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack , you steal up to [!15...39...45!] Health from that foe.
123.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Steal [!15...39...45!] Health whenever target foe hits with an attack.

142.name: Lingering Curse
142.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!6...25...30!] seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer - [!0...2...3!] Health degeneration , and gain 20% less benefit from healing.
142.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!6...25...30!] seconds.) Target and nearby foes have - [!0...2...3!] Health degeneration and receive 20% less benefit from healing.

140.name: Malaise
140.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...29...35!] seconds, target foe suffers -1 Energy degeneration and you suffer -1 Health degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes [!5...41...50!] damage and Malaise ends.
140.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Deals [!5...41...50!] damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. You have -1 Health degeneration. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.

150.name: Mark of Pain
150.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target foe takes physical damage , Mark of Pain deals [!10...34...40!] shadow damage to adjacent foes.
150.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals [!10...34...40!] damage to adjacent foes whenever target foe takes physical damage.

1260.name: Meekness
1260.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...25...30!] seconds, target foe and all foes in the area attack 50% slower.
1260.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes in the area of target ( [!5...25...30!] seconds). These foes attack 50% slower.

863.name: Order of Apostasy
863.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage , that foe loses one enchantment. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose [!25...17...15!] % maximum Health.
863.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members remove one enchantment when they deal physical damage. Removal cost: for each Monk enchantment, you lose [![!25...17...15!]!] % maximum Health.

1359.name: Pain of Disenchantment
1359.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe loses [!1...3...3!] enchantment [s]. If an enchantment was lost in this way, that foe and all adjacent foes lose [!10...82...100!] Health.
1359.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Target foe loses [!1...3...3!] enchantment[s]. Removal effect: that foe and all adjacent foes lose [!10...82...100!] Health.

99.name: Parasitic Bond
99.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Health degeneration. The caster is healed for [!30...102...120!] when Parasitic Bond ends.
99.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for [!30...102...120!] Health.

149.name: Plague Sending
149.desc_full: Spell. Transfer [!1...3...3!] negative condition [s] and [its/their] remaining duration [s] from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.
149.desc_concise: Spell. Transfer [!1...3...3!] condition[s] and [its/their] remaining duration[s] from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

132.name: Plague Signet
132.desc_full: Elite Signet. Transfer all negative conditions with [!100...180...200!] % of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. (50% failure chance with Curses 4 or less.)
132.desc_concise: Elite Signet. Transfers all conditions with [!100...180...200!] % of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. 50% failure chance unless Curses 5 or more.

154.name: Plague Touch
154.desc_full: Skill. Transfer [!1...3...3!] negative condition [s] and [its/their] remaining duration [s] from yourself to target touched foe.
154.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Transfers [!1...3...3!] condition[s] from yourself to target foe.

840.name: Poisoned Heart
840.desc_full: Spell. You and all adjacent foes are Poisoned for [!5...13...15!] seconds.
840.desc_concise: Spell. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( [!5...13...15!] seconds) to adjacent foes. You are also Poisoned.

103.name: Price of Failure
103.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks and takes [!1...37...46!] damage whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.
103.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) 25% chance to miss. Target foe takes [!1...37...46!] damage whenever it fails to hit.

834.name: Reckless Haste
834.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!6...11...12!] seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Reckless Haste. While hexed, they attack 25% faster but have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.
834.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target ( [!6...11...12!] seconds). These foes have 50% chance to miss, but attack 25% faster.

141.name: Rend Enchantments
141.desc_full: Spell. Remove [!5...8...9!] enchantments from target foe. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose [!55...31...25!] Health.
141.desc_concise: Spell. Removes [!5...8...9!] enchantments from target foe. Removal cost: you lose [![!55...31...25!]!] Health for each Monk enchantment removed.

137.name: Rigor Mortis
137.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, target foe cannot block.
137.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Target foe cannot block.

955.name: Rip Enchantment
955.desc_full: Spell. Remove 1 enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment was removed, that foe suffers from Bleeding for [!5...21...25!] seconds.
955.desc_concise: Spell. Removes 1 enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Bleeding ( [!5...21...25!] seconds).

136.name: Shadow of Fear
136.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes attack 50% slower for the next [!5...25...30!] seconds.
136.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target ( [!5...25...30!] seconds). They attack 50% slower.

1071.name: Shivers of Dread
1071.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!10...34...40!] seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill , that foe is interrupted and you lose [!10...6...5!] Energy or Shivers of Dread ends.
1071.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!10...34...40!] seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. Interruption cost: you lose [![!10...6...5!]!] Energy or this hex ends.

100.name: Soul Barbs
100.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes [!15...27...30!] damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.
100.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals [!15...27...30!] damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on target foe.

901.name: Soul Bind
901.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed , the healer takes [!20...68...80!] damage. This hex ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.
901.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Every time target foe is healed, the healer takes [!20...68...80!] damage. Ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.

124.name: Spinal Shivers
124.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!10...34...40!] seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill , that foe is interrupted , and you lose [!10...6...5!] Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.
124.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!10...34...40!] seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. Interruption cost: you lose [![!10...6...5!]!] Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.

121.name: Spiteful Spirit
121.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, whenever target foe attacks or uses a skill , Spiteful Spirit deals [!5...29...35!] shadow damage to that foe and all adjacent allies of that foe.
121.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Deals [!5...29...35!] damage to target and adjacent foes whenever this foe attacks or uses a skill.

108.name: Suffering
108.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!6...25...30!] seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer - [!0...2...3!] Health degeneration.
108.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target ( [!6...25...30!] seconds). These foes have - [!0...2...3!] Health degeneration.

1358.name: Ulcerous Lungs
1358.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!10...22...25!] seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer from -4 Health degeneration when Bleeding , and whenever they use a shout or chant , they Bleed for [!3...13...15!] seconds.
1358.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( [!10...22...25!] seconds). Causes -4 Health degeneration to any of these foes that are Bleeding. Inflicts Bleeding ( [!3...13...15!] seconds) whenever these foes use a shout or chant.

883.name: Vocal Minority
883.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target foe and all nearby foes cannot use shouts or chants.
883.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). These foes cannot use shouts or chants.

159.name: Weaken Armor
159.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and foes adjacent to your target have Cracked Armor for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
159.desc_concise: Spell. Also affects adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

822.name: Weaken Knees
822.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...13...16!] second[s], target foe suffers - [!1...3...4!] Health degeneration and takes [!5...9...10!] damage while moving.
822.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!1...13...16!] second[s].) Target foe has - [!1...3...4!] Health degeneration and takes [!5...9...10!] damage while moving.

1366.name: Well of Darkness
1366.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Darkness for [!5...41...50!] seconds. Hexed foes within the Well of Darkness miss 50% of the time.
1366.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!5...41...50!] seconds.) Hexed foes in this well have 50% chance to miss. Exploits a fresh corpse .

2236.name: Well of Ruin
2236.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Ruin at its location. For [!5...25...30!] seconds, whenever a foe in the well takes physical damage , that foe has Cracked Armor for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
2236.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!5...25...30!] seconds.) Inflicts Cracked Armor condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) to any foe in the well that takes physical damage. Exploits a fresh corpse.

1660.name: Well of Silence
1660.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Silence for [!10...26...30!] seconds. Foes within the well cannot use shouts or chants and suffer - [!1...3...4!] Health degeneration.
1660.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!10...26...30!] seconds.) Foes in this well cannot use shouts and chants and have - [!1...3...4!] Health degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

818.name: Well of Weariness
818.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Weariness for [!10...46...55!] seconds. Enemies within the Well of Weariness suffer -1 Energy degeneration.
818.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!10...46...55!] seconds.) Foes in this well have -1 Energy degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

125.name: Wither
125.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!5...29...35!] seconds, target foe suffers - [!2...4...4!] Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage and Wither ends.
125.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) Causes - [!2...4...4!] Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. Deals [!15...63...75!] damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.

84.name: Animate Bone Fiend
84.desc_full: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level [!1...14...17!] bone fiend. Bone fiends can attack at range.
84.desc_concise: Spell. Creates a level [!1...14...17!] bone fiend that can attack at range. Exploits a fresh corpse.

83.name: Animate Bone Horror
83.desc_full: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level [!1...14...17!] bone horror.
83.desc_concise: Spell. Creates a level [!1...14...17!] bone horror. Exploits a fresh corpse.

85.name: Animate Bone Minions
85.desc_full: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate two level [!0...10...12!] bone minions.
85.desc_concise: Spell. Creates two level [!0...10...12!] bone minions. Exploits a fresh corpse.

832.name: Animate Flesh Golem
832.desc_full: Elite Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level [!3...21...25!] Flesh Golem. The Flesh Golem leaves an exploitable corpse. You can have only one Flesh Golem at a time.
832.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Creates a level [!3...21...25!] flesh golem which leaves a fresh corpse when it dies. Exploits a fresh corpse. You can have only one flesh golem at a time.

1351.name: Animate Shambling Horror
1351.desc_full: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a level [!1...14...17!] shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies , it is replaced by a level [!0...12...15!] jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.
1351.desc_concise: Spell. Creates a level [!1...14...17!] shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level [!0...12...15!] jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks. Exploits a fresh corpse.

805.name: Animate Vampiric Horror
805.desc_full: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level [!1...14...17!] Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage , you gain the same amount of Health.
805.desc_concise: Spell. Creates a level [!1...14...17!] vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to the damage it deals. Exploits a fresh corpse.

114.name: Aura of the Lich
114.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level [!1...14...17!] bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For [!5...37...45!] seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.
114.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. Exploit all corpses in earshot. Animates a level [!1...14...17!] bone horror, plus one for each exploited corpse. You have +1 Death Magic ( [!5...37...45!] seconds).

1068.name: Bitter Chill
1068.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!15...51...60!] cold damage. If that foe had more Health than you, Bitter Chill recharges instantly.
1068.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...51...60!] cold damage. Recharges instantly if target foe had more Health than you.

120.name: Blood of the Master
120.desc_full: Spell. All of your undead allies are healed for [!30...99...116!] Health. You sacrifice an additional 2% maximum Health per minion healed in this way.
120.desc_concise: Spell. Heals your undead servants for [!30...99...116!] . Healing cost: +2% Health sacrifice per servant healed.

98.name: Consume Corpse
98.desc_full: Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and gain [!25...85...100!] Health and [!5...17...20!] Energy.
98.desc_concise: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. You gain [!25...85...100!] Health and [!5...17...20!] Energy. Exploits a fresh corpse.

1356.name: Contagion
1356.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you suffer from a new condition , all foes in the area suffer from that same condition and you sacrifice [!10...6...5!] % maximum Health.
1356.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you gain a condition, all foes in the area gain that same condition. You sacrifice [![!10...6...5!]!] % maximum Health each time this happens.

116.name: Dark Aura
116.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target ally sacrifices Health , Dark Aura deals [!5...41...50!] shadow damage to adjacent foes , and you lose [!5...17...20!] Health.
116.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds). Deals [!5...41...50!] damage to adjacent foes whenever target ally sacrifices Health. Damage cost: you lose [![!5...17...20!]!] Health.

104.name: Death Nova
104.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies , all adjacent foes take [!26...85...100!] damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.
104.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals [!26...85...100!] damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.

89.name: Deathly Chill
89.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!5...41...50!] cold damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you deal an additional [!5...41...50!] shadow damage.
89.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...41...50!] cold damage. Deals [!5...41...50!] more damage if target foe was above 50% Health.

105.name: Deathly Swarm
105.desc_full: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for [!30...78...90!] cold damage on up to three targets in the area.
105.desc_concise: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals [!30...78...90!] cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.

817.name: Discord
817.desc_full: Elite Spell. If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment , that foe suffers [!30...94...110!] damage.
817.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!30...94...110!] damage. No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.

1354.name: Feast for the Dead
1354.desc_full: Spell. Destroy target animated undead ally. All of your other animated undead allies are healed for [!10...82...100!] Health.
1354.desc_concise: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Heals your servants for [!10...82...100!] .

841.name: Fetid Ground
841.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!15...55...65!] cold damage. If that foe is knocked down , that foe becomes Poisoned for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
841.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...55...65!] cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

139.name: Infuse Condition
139.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For the next [!15...51...60!] seconds, whenever you receive a condition , that condition is transferred to your closest minion instead.
139.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!15...51...60!] seconds.) Whenever you receive a condition, it transfers from you to your closest undead servant.

1355.name: Jagged Bones
1355.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target undead servant dies , it is replaced by a level [!0...12...15!] jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.
1355.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) When target undead servant dies, it is replaced by a level [!0...12...15!] jagged horror that inflicts Bleeding with attacks.

122.name: Malign Intervention
122.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target foe receives 20% less benefit from healing. If target foe dies while hexed with Malign Intervention, a level [!1...14...17!] masterless bone horror is summoned.
122.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Target foe receives 20% less from healing. If this foe dies while suffering from this hex, a level [!1...14...17!] masterless bone horror is summoned.

97.name: Necrotic Traversal
97.desc_full: Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and all nearby foes become Poisoned for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
97.desc_concise: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Affects all nearby foes. Exploits a fresh corpse.

1352.name: Order of Undeath
1352.desc_full: Elite Spell. For 5 seconds, your minions deal + [!3...13...16!] damage , but you lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever one of your minions hits with an attack.
1352.desc_concise: Elite Spell. (5 seconds.) Your undead servants deal + [!3...13...16!] damage. You lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever your servants hit.

2058.name: Putrid Bile
2058.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target foe suffers - [!1...3...3!] Health degeneration. If that foe dies while under the effects of this hex, all nearby foes take [!25...73...85!] damage.
2058.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Causes - [!1...3...3!] Health degeneration. Deals [!25...73...85!] damage to all nearby foes if target foe dies.

95.name: Putrid Explosion
95.desc_full: Spell. The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals [!24...101...120!] damage to nearby foes.
95.desc_concise: Spell. Explodes a corpse, dealing [!24...101...120!] damage to foes near it. Exploits a fresh corpse.

1353.name: Putrid Flesh
1353.desc_full: Spell. Destroy one of your target animated undead minions. All foes near that creature are Diseased for [!5...13...15!] seconds.
1353.desc_concise: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Inflicts Diseased condition ( [!5...13...15!] seconds) to foes near this servant.

935.name: Rising Bile
935.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, this hex does nothing. When Rising Bile ends, that foe and all foes in the area take [!1...5...6!] damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect.
935.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) End effect: deals [!1...5...6!] damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect. Also damages other foes in the area.

106.name: Rotting Flesh
106.desc_full: Spell. Target fleshy foe becomes Diseased for [!10...22...25!] seconds, slowly losing Health.

96.name: Soul Feast
96.desc_full: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to gain [!50...234...280!] Health.
96.desc_concise: Spell. You gain [!50...234...280!] Health. Exploits a fresh corpse.

113.name: Tainted Flesh
113.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!20...39...44!] seconds, target ally is immune to disease , and anyone striking that ally in melee becomes Diseased for [!3...13...15!] seconds.
113.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!20...39...44!] seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased ( [!3...13...15!] seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.

152.name: Taste of Death
152.desc_full: Spell. Steal up to [!100...340...400!] Health from target animated undead ally.
152.desc_concise: Spell. Steals [!100...340...400!] Health from allied undead servant.

1069.name: Taste of Pain
1069.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is below 50% Health , you gain [!30...126...150!] Health.
1069.desc_concise: Spell. Heals you for [!30...126...150!] . No effect unless target foe is below 50% Health.

1659.name: Toxic Chill
1659.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for [!15...63...75!] cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment , that foe becomes Poisoned for [!10...22...25!] seconds.
1659.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!15...63...75!] cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( [!10...22...25!] seconds) if target foe is hexed or enchanted.

88.name: Verata's Aura
88.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. All hostile animated undead in the area become bound to you. Verata's Aura ends after [!120...264...300!] seconds. When Verata's Aura ends, you lose your bond with any undead bound to you. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)
88.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!120...264...300!] seconds.) Become master of all hostile undead servants in the area. End effect: your undead servants become masterless. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

87.name: Verata's Gaze
87.desc_full: Spell. If target hostile animated undead has a master, its bond to its master is broken, making it hostile to all other creatures. If it had no master , you become its master. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)
87.desc_concise: Spell. Make target undead servant masterless. If it is already masterless, you become its master. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

90.name: Verata's Sacrifice
90.desc_full: Spell. For [!5...9...10!] seconds, your undead allies gain +10 Health regeneration. All conditions are removed from those allies and transferred to you. If this spell is successful and you have control of 3 or fewer minions , Verata's Sacrifice instantly recharges.
90.desc_concise: Spell. ( [!5...9...10!] seconds.) 10 undead allied servants gain +10 Health regeneration. Instantly recharges if you have control of 3 or fewer servants. Transfers all conditions from those servants to you.

828.name: Vile Miasma
828.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for [!10...54...65!] cold damage. If suffering from a condition , that foe is hexed with Vile Miasma and suffers - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
828.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Causes - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals [!10...54...65!] cold damage. Hex is only applied if target foe has a condition.

155.name: Vile Touch
155.desc_full: Skill. Touch target foe to deal [!20...56...65!] damage.

107.name: Virulence
107.desc_full: Elite Spell. If target foe was already suffering from a condition , that foe suffers from Disease , Poison , and Weakness for [!3...13...15!] seconds.
107.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Inflicts Disease, Poison, and Weakness conditions ( [!3...13...15!] seconds). No effect unless this foe already had a condition.

93.name: Well of Suffering
93.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Suffering at its location. For [!10...26...30!] seconds, foes in that area suffer - [!1...5...6!] Health degeneration.
93.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!10...26...30!] seconds.) Foes in this well have - [!1...5...6!] Health degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

94.name: Well of the Profane
94.desc_full: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of the Profane at its location. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, foes in that area are stripped of all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)
94.desc_concise: Well Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Foes in this well lose all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. Exploits a fresh corpse. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

1997.name: Withering Aura
1997.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target ally 's melee attacks cause Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
1997.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Target ally's melee attacks cause Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.)

2189.name: Angorodon's Gaze
2189.desc_full: Spell. Steal [!10...42...50!] Health from target foe. If you are suffering from a condition , you gain [!3...10...12!] Energy.
2189.desc_concise: Spell. Steals [!10...42...50!] Health. You gain [!3...10...12!] Energy if you have a condition.

2057.name: Foul Feast
2057.desc_full: Spell. All conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired in this way, you gain [!0...36...45!] Health and [!0...2...2!] Energy. This skill recharges twice as fast if you remove Disease from your target.
2057.desc_concise: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. You gain [!0...36...45!] Health and [!0...2...2!] Energy for each condition transferred. Half recharge if you remove Disease. Cannot self-target.

2138.name: Hexer's Vigor
2138.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you have + [!1...7...8!] Health regeneration. Hexer's Vigor ends if you cast a non- hex skill.
2138.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have + [!1...7...8!] Health regeneration. Ends if you use a non-hex skill.

821.name: Icy Veins
821.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for [!10...74...90!] cold damage. For [!10...30...35!] seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for [!20...92...110!] cold damage.
821.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) Deals [!20...92...110!] cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals [!10...74...90!] cold damage.

2139.name: Masochism
2139.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!10...34...40!] seconds, you have +2 to your Death Magic and Soul Reaping attributes and sacrifice [!5...3...3!] % of your maximum Health when you cast a spell.
2139.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell.  ( [!10...34...40!] seconds.) You have +2 Death Magic and Soul Reaping. Sacrifice [!5...3...3!] %  Health when you cast a spell.

808.name: Reaper's Mark
808.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe suffers - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration. If that foe dies while hexed with Reaper's Mark, you gain [!5...13...15!] Energy.
808.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Causes - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration. You gain [!5...13...15!] Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.

1365.name: Signet of Lost Souls
1365.desc_full: Signet. If target foe is below 50% Health , you gain [!10...82...100!] Health and [!1...8...10!] Energy.
1365.desc_concise: Signet. You gain [!10...82...100!] Health and [!1...8...10!] Energy if target foe is below 50% Health.

1363.name: Signet of Sorrow
1363.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage. If target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet , this skill recharges instantly.
1363.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!15...63...75!] damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet.

764.name: Wail of Doom
764.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...3...4!] second[s], all of target foe 's attributes are set to 0.
764.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!1...3...4!] second[s].) Target foe's attributes are 0.

766.name: Gaze of Contempt
766.desc_full: Spell. If target foe has more than 50% Health , that foe loses all enchantments.
766.desc_concise: Spell. Removes target foe's enchantments. No effect unless this foe has more than 50% Health.

86.name: Grenth's Balance
86.desc_full: Elite Spell. If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.
86.desc_concise: Elite Spell. You gain Health equal to half the difference between you and target, and this foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose Health equal to half the difference.

2055.name: Aneurysm
2055.desc_full: Spell. Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained in this way, that foe takes [!1...3...3!] damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy. (Maximum [!1...24...30!] ).
2055.desc_concise: Spell. Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained, target takes [!1...3...3!] damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy (maximum [!1...24...30!] ).

1062.name: Arcane Larceny
1062.desc_full: Spell. For [!5...29...35!] seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Arcane Larceny is replaced by that spell.
1062.desc_concise: Spell. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.

81.name: Arcane Thievery
81.desc_full: Spell. For [!5...29...35!] seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe , and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.
81.desc_concise: Spell. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.

28.name: Backfire
28.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell , that foe takes [!35...119...140!] damage.
28.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes [!35...119...140!] damage whenever it casts a spell.

29.name: Blackout
29.desc_full: Skill. For [!2...5...6!] seconds, all of touched target foe 's skills are disabled , and all of your skills are disabled for 5 seconds.
29.desc_concise: Touch Skill. ( [!2...5...6!] seconds.) Disables skills. Your skills are disabled (5 seconds).

77.name: Chaos Storm
77.desc_full: Spell. Create a Chaos Storm at target foe 's location that lasts for 10 seconds. Each second, foes adjacent to this location take [!5...21...25!] damage and lose [!0...2...2!] Energy.
77.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...21...25!] damage and causes [!0...2...2!] Energy loss each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

932.name: Complicate
932.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is using a skill , that skill is interrupted and disabled for target foe and all foes in the area for an additional [!5...11...12!] seconds.
932.desc_concise: Spell. Interrupt a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+ [!5...11...12!] seconds) for target foe and all foes in the area.

57.name: Cry of Frustration
57.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is using a skill , that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer [!15...63...75!] damage.
57.desc_concise: Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and take [!15...63...75!] damage.

30.name: Diversion
30.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill , that skill takes an additional [!10...47...56!] seconds to recharge.
30.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next skill takes + [!10...47...56!] seconds to recharge.

26.name: Empathy
26.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, whenever target foe attacks , that foe takes [!10...46...55!] damage and deals [!1...12...15!] less damage.
26.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Target foe's attacks deal [!1...12...15!] less damage, and that foe takes [!10...46...55!] damage with each attack.

1345.name: Enchanter's Conundrum
1345.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe casts enchantments [!100...180...200!] % slower. If target foe is not under the effects of an enchantment when this hex is applied, that foe and all adjacent foes take [!10...82...100!] damage.
1345.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Causes [!100...180...200!] % slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals [!10...82...100!] damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

42.name: Energy Burn
42.desc_full: Spell. Target foe loses [!1...8...10!] Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.
42.desc_concise: Spell. Causes [!1...8...10!] Energy loss. Deals 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

39.name: Energy Surge
39.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe loses [!1...8...10!] Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.
39.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Causes [!1...8...10!] Energy loss. Deals 9 damage to target and nearby foes for each point of Energy lost.

46.name: Guilt
46.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets a foe, the spell fails and you steal up to [!5...12...14!] Energy from that foe.
46.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal [!5...12...14!] Energy. No effect unless this foe's spell targets one of your allies.

10.name: Hex Breaker
10.desc_full: Stance. For [!5...65...80!] seconds, the next time you are the target of a hex , that hex fails and the caster takes [!10...39...46!] damage.
10.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...65...80!] seconds.) The next hex against you fails and the caster takes [!10...39...46!] damage.

1348.name: Hex Eater Vortex
1348.desc_full: Elite Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed in this way, foes near that ally take [!30...78...90!] damage and lose one enchantment.
1348.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Removes one hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals [!30...78...90!] damage and removes one enchantment from foes near this ally.

35.name: Ignorance
35.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds target foe cannot use signets.
35.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Target foe cannot use signets.

49.name: Mind Wrack
49.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...33...40!] seconds, whenever this foe is the target of any of your non-hex Mesmer skills , that foe loses 1 Energy and takes [!5...21...25!] damage per point of Energy lost. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes [!15...83...100!] damage.
49.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...33...40!] seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. Deals [!5...21...25!] damage per point of Energy lost. If target foe's Energy drops to 0, it takes [!15...83...100!] damage and Mind Wrack ends.

979.name: Mistrust
979.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals [!10...82...100!] damage to that foe and all nearby foes.
979.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals [!10...82...100!] damage to target and nearby foes.

898.name: Overload
898.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe suffers - [!1...3...3!] Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill , then Overload deals [!15...63...75!] damage to that foe and all adjacent foes.
898.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes - [!1...3...3!] Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all adjacent foes take [!15...63...75!] damage.

52.name: Panic
52.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...8...10!] second[s], target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Panic. When a foe hexed with Panic successfully uses a skill , all other nearby foes are interrupted.
52.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]). Interrupts all other nearby foes whenever a hexed foe successfully activates a skill.

5.name: Power Block
5.desc_full: Elite Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant , that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled for [!1...10...12!] seconds and that skill is interrupted.
5.desc_concise: Elite Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled ( [!1...10...12!] seconds) and that skill is interrupted.

953.name: Power Flux
953.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant , that skill is interrupted and for [!4...9...10!] seconds, that foe has -2 Energy degeneration.
953.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: -2 Energy degeneration ( [!4...9...10!] seconds).

24.name: Power Leak
24.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant , that skill is interrupted and target foe loses [!3...14...17!] Energy.
24.desc_concise: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: causes [!3...14...17!] Energy loss.

1994.name: Power Lock
1994.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant , that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional [!5...11...13!] seconds.
1994.desc_concise: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: interrupted spell or chant is disabled for + [!5...11...13!] seconds.

23.name: Power Spike
23.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or a chant , that skill is interrupted and target foe takes [!30...102...120!] damage.
23.desc_concise: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: deals [!30...102...120!] damage.

1655.name: Price of Pride
1655.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, the next time target foe uses an elite skill , that foe loses [!1...6...7!] Energy.
1655.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Causes [!1...6...7!] Energy loss the next time target foe uses an elite skill.

1053.name: Psychic Distraction
1053.desc_full: Elite Spell. All of your other skills are disabled for 8 seconds. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional [!5...11...12!] seconds.
1053.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+ [!5...11...12!] seconds). Your other skills are disabled (8 seconds).

51.name: Shame
51.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally , the spell fails and you steal up to [!5...12...14!] Energy from that foe.
51.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal [!5...12...14!] Energy. No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.

27.name: Shatter Delusions
27.desc_full: Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes [!15...63...75!] damage.
27.desc_concise: Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: [!15...63...75!] damage to target and all adjacent foes.

69.name: Shatter Enchantment
69.desc_full: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, that foe takes [!14...83...100!] damage.
69.desc_concise: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals [!14...83...100!] damage.

67.name: Shatter Hex
67.desc_full: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes near that ally take [!30...102...120!] damage.
67.desc_concise: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals [!30...102...120!] damage to foes near this ally.

860.name: Signet of Disruption
860.desc_full: Signet. If target foe is casting a spell , the spell is interrupted and that foe suffers [!10...43...51!] damage. If that foe is hexed , Signet of Disruption can interrupt any non-spell skills.
860.desc_concise: Signet. Interrupts a spell. Can interrupt any skill if target foe is hexed. Interruption effect: deals [!10...43...51!] damage.

1992.name: Signet of Distraction
1992.desc_full: Signet. If target foe is casting a spell , that spell is interrupted and disabled for [!1...4...5!] seconds for each signet you have equipped.
1992.desc_concise: Signet. Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: target foe's spell is disabled for [!1...4...5!] seconds for each signet you have equipped.

59.name: Signet of Weariness
59.desc_full: Signet. Target foe and all nearby foes lose [!3...7...8!] Energy and suffer from Weakness for [!1...10...12!] second[s].
59.desc_concise: Signet. Also affects foes near your target. Causes [!3...7...8!] Energy loss and inflicts Weakness ( [!1...10...12!] second[s]).

1350.name: Simple Thievery
1350.desc_full: Elite Spell. Interrupt target foe 's action. If that action was a skill , that skill is disabled for [!5...17...20!] seconds, and Simple Thievery is replaced by that skill.
1350.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: If a skill was interrupted, that skill is disabled and Simple Thievery becomes that skill ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

1336.name: Spiritual Pain
1336.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take [!25...105...125!] damage.
1336.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...63...75!] damage. Deals [!25...105...125!] damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

934.name: Unnatural Signet
934.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment , foes adjacent to your target take [!5...41...50!] damage.
934.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!15...63...75!] damage. Deals [!5...41...50!] damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

878.name: Visions of Regret
878.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take [!15...39...45!] damage whenever they use a skill and [!5...41...50!] additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.
878.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take [!15...39...45!] damage whenever they use a skill and [!5...41...50!] additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

1335.name: Wastrel's Demise
1335.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe is hexed with Wastrel's Demise. Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take [!1...8...10!] damage and an additional [!1...8...10!] damage for each second this spell is in effect. This hex ends prematurely if target foe uses a skill.
1335.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take [!1...8...10!] damage. Foes take + [!1...8...10!] damage each second this hex is in effect. Ends early if target foe uses a skill.

50.name: Wastrel's Worry
50.desc_full: Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take [!20...84...100!] damage. If that foe successfully uses a skill , Wastrel's Worry ends prematurely and does no damage.
50.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (3 seconds). End effect: causes [!20...84...100!] damage to target and adjacent foes. No effect and ends early if target foe uses a skill.

2684.name: Unnatural Signet (Saul D'Alessio)
2684.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!43...47!] damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment , foes adjacent to your target take [!26...29!] damage.
2684.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!43...47!] damage. Deals [!26...29!] damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

804.name: Arcane Languor
804.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...8...10!] second[s], all spells cast by the target foe cause 10 Overcast.
804.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!1...8...10!] second[s].) Target foe's spells cause 10 Overcast.

63.name: Keystone Signet
63.desc_full: Elite Signet. All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next [!0...5...6!] time[s] you use a signet that targets a foe , all other foes adjacent to your target take [!15...51...60!] damage and are interrupted.
63.desc_concise: Elite Signet. (20 seconds.) Your next [!0...5...6!] signet[s] interrupt [ sic ] and deal [!15...51...60!] damage to other foes adjacent to your target. Initial Effect: [ sic ] recharges all of your other signets.

13.name: Mantra of Recovery
13.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.
13.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Your spells recharge 33% faster.

1338.name: Persistence of Memory
1338.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, whenever a spell you cast is interrupted , that spell is instantly recharged.
1338.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Your interrupted spells recharge instantly.

931.name: Power Return
931.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant , that skill is interrupted and target foe gains [!10...6...5!] Energy.
931.desc_concise: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: target foe gains [!10...6...5!] Energy.

1057.name: Psychic Instability
1057.desc_full: Elite Spell. Interrupt the target foe 's action. If that action was a skill , that foe and nearby foes are knocked down for [!2...4...4!] seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)
1057.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, cause knockdown for [!2...4...4!] seconds on target foe and all nearby foes. 50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.

880.name: Stolen Speed
880.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...8...10!] seconds, spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells targeting these foes that are cast by you or your allies take 50% less time to cast.
880.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes ( [!1...8...10!] seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells cast by you or your allies have -50% casting times.

1340.name: Symbolic Celerity
1340.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!36...55...60!] seconds, all of your signets use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.
1340.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!36...55...60!] seconds.) Your signets use your Fast Casting attribute.

1658.name: Symbolic Posture
1658.desc_full: Stance. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, the next signet you activate recharges [!20...68...80!] % faster.
1658.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Your next signet recharges [!20...68...80!] % faster.

1339.name: Symbols of Inspiration
1339.desc_full: Elite Skill. For [!1...25...31!] seconds, this skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.
1339.desc_concise: Elite Skill. ( [!1...25...31!] seconds.) This skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.

1052.name: Accumulated Pain
1052.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes , that foe suffers a Deep Wound for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
1052.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...63...75!] damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

1656.name: Air of Disenchantment
1656.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe and all nearby foes. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, enchantments expire [!150...270...300!] % faster on those foes.
1656.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Remove one enchantment from target and nearby foes. Enchantments expire [!150...270...300!] % faster on those foes.

1054.name: Ancestor's Visage
1054.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!4...9...10!] seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack , all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.
1054.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!4...9...10!] seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.

36.name: Arcane Conundrum
36.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends , you gain [!1...6...7!] energy. [ sic ]
36.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target ( [!5...13...15!] seconds). Doubles spell casting time. End effect: you gain [!1...6...7!] energy. [ sic ]
