1349.name: Mirror of Disenchantment
1349.desc_full: Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. All of that foe's party members also lose that same enchantment.
1349.desc_concise: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

933.name: Shatter Storm
933.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe loses all enchantments. For each enchantment removed this way, Shatter Storm is disabled for an additional 7 seconds.
933.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Removes all enchantments. Removal cost: Shatter Storm is disabled for +7 seconds for each enchantment removed.

882.name: Signet of Disenchantment
882.desc_full: Signet. Lose all Energy. Target foe loses one enchantment.
882.desc_concise: Signet. Removes one enchantment. You lose all Energy.

58.name: Signet of Midnight
58.desc_full: Elite Signet. You and target touched foe become Blinded for 15 seconds.
58.desc_concise: Elite Touch Signet. (15 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition. You suffer from Blindness (15 seconds).

1344.name: Web of Disruption
1344.desc_full: Hex Spell. Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.
1344.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

225.name: Air Attunement
225.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!36...55...60!] seconds, you are attuned to Air. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill whenever you use Air Magic.
225.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!36...55...60!] seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost whenever you use an Air Magic skill.

842.name: Arc Lightning
842.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!5...33...40!] lightning damage. If you are Overcast , two foes near your target are struck for [!15...71...85!] lightning damage. Damage from Arc Lightning has 25% armor penetration.
842.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...33...40!] lightning damage. Deals [!15...71...85!] lightning damage to two nearby foes if you are Overcast. 25% armor penetration.

220.name: Blinding Flash
220.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is Blinded for [!3...7...8!] seconds.

1367.name: Blinding Surge
1367.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. That foe and all adjacent foes are Blinded for [!3...7...8!] seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If this spell strikes an attacking foe, all adjacent foes are also struck and this spell deals 50% more damage.
1367.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition ( [!3...7...8!] seconds) on target and adjacent foes. 25% armor penetration. If target was attacking, also hits adjacent foes and deals 50% more damage.

223.name: Chain Lightning
223.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for [!10...70...85!] lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
223.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...70...85!] lightning damage. Also hits two foes near your target. 25% armor penetration.

1368.name: Chilling Winds
1368.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for [!30...54...60!] cold damage. For 10 seconds, the next Water Magic hex targeting a hexed foe lasts [!25...85...100!] % longer.
1368.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) The next water hex on target foe lasts [!25...85...100!] % longer. Initial effect: [!30...54...60!] cold damage. Also strikes adjacent.

221.name: Conjure Lightning
221.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a lightning weapon , your attacks strike for an additional [!5...17...20!] lightning damage.
221.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for + [!5...17...20!] lightning damage. No effect unless your weapon deals lightning damage.

224.name: Enervating Charge
224.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!25...45...50!] lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
224.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!25...45...50!] lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). 25% armor penetration.

162.name: Gale
162.desc_full: Spell. Knock down target foe for 2 seconds. (50% failure chance with Air Magic 4 or less.)
162.desc_concise: Spell. Causes knock-down. 50% failure chance unless Air Magic 5 or more.

227.name: Glimmering Mark
227.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to your target take [!5...21...25!] damage each second. Foes using attack skills are Blinded for 3 seconds. This hex ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.
227.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Deals [!5...21...25!] damage each second to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Blindness [ sic ] on foes using attack skills. Ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.

2002.name: Glyph of Swiftness
2002.desc_full: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next [!1...4...5!] spell [s] recharge 25% faster and projectiles from the affected spells move 200% faster.
2002.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next [!1...4...5!] spell[s] recharge 25% faster and projectiles from them move 200% faster.

843.name: Gust
843.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, both you and target ally move 33% faster. When you cast this spell , all foes near you and your target take [!15...59...70!] cold damage. Foes struck by Gust while attacking or moving are knocked down.
843.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You and target ally move 33% faster. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for [!15...59...70!] cold damage.  Attacking or moving foes are knocked down.

1664.name: Invoke Lightning
1664.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for [!10...74...90!] lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
1664.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...74...90!] lightning damage. Hits two foes near target. 25% armor penetration.

1369.name: Lightning Bolt
1369.desc_full: Spell. Send out a Lightning Bolt that strikes for [!5...41...50!] lightning damage if it hits. If Lightning Bolt strikes a moving foe , that foe is struck for [!5...41...50!] additional lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
1369.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. Deals [!5...41...50!] more lightning damage if target foe is moving. 25% armor penetration.

865.name: Lightning Hammer
865.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!10...82...100!] lightning damage and applies [ sic ] Cracked Armor for [!5...17...20!] seconds. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.
865.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...82...100!] lightning damage. Applies Cracked Armor ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). 25% armor penetration.

230.name: Lightning Javelin
230.desc_full: Spell. Send out a Lightning Javelin that strikes for [!15...43...50!] lightning damage if it hits. Lightning Javelin interrupts attacking foes. This spell has 25% armor penetration and strikes all foes between you and your target.
230.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: Deals [!15...43...50!] lightning damage. Interrupts if your target is attacking. 25% armor penetration. Strikes all foes between you and your target.

229.name: Lightning Orb
229.desc_full: Spell. Send out a Lightning Orb that strikes target foe for [!10...82...100!] lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
229.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!10...82...100!] lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

222.name: Lightning Strike
222.desc_full: Hex Spell. Strike target foe for [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast , that foe is hexed with Lightning Strike for 3 seconds. When this hex ends , that foe is struck again for [!5...41...50!] lightning damage.
222.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Deals [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Hex for 3 seconds if Overcast. End effect: deals [!5...41...50!] lightning damage.

205.name: Lightning Surge
205.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe is knocked down and struck for [!14...83...100!] lightning damage , and has Cracked Armor for [!5...17...20!] seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
205.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: deals [!14...83...100!] lightning damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Cracked Armor ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). 25% armor penetration.

232.name: Lightning Touch
232.desc_full: Skill. Target touched foe and all adjacent foes are struck for [!10...50...60!] lightning damage , are Blinded for [!1...3...4!] second[s], and have Cracked Armor for [!1...8...10!] second[s]. This skill has 25% armor penetration.
232.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!10...50...60!] lightning damage. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe. Inflicts Blind ( [!1...3...4!] second[s]) and Cracked Armor ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]) on all struck foes. 25% armor penetration.

226.name: Mind Shock
226.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe suffers [!10...42...50!] lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers [!10...42...50!] more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
226.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...42...50!] lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals + [!10...42...50!] lightning damage and causes knockdown. 25% armor penetration.

836.name: Ride the Lightning
836.desc_full: Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for [!1...4...5!] second[s]. If your target is a foe, it is struck for [!10...58...70!] lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
836.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...58...70!] lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

2059.name: Shell Shock
2059.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!10...26...30!] lightning damage and has Cracked Armor for [!5...17...20!] seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast , this spell strikes adjacent foes.
2059.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...26...30!] lightning damage. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). 25% armor penetration. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

231.name: Shock
231.desc_full: Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down and struck for [!10...50...60!] lightning damage. This skill has 25% armor penetration.
231.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!10...50...60!] lightning damage. Causes knock-down. 25% armor penetration.

1082.name: Shock Arrow
1082.desc_full: Spell. Send out a shocking arrow that flies swiftly toward target foe , striking for [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. If Shock Arrow strikes a foe suffering from Cracked Armor , you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage. Shock Arrow has 25% armor penetration.
1082.desc_concise: Spell. Rapid projectile: deals [!5...41...50!] lightning damage. Gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if you hit a foe suffering from Cracked Armor. 25% armor penetration.

1370.name: Storm Djinn's Haste
1370.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!10...22...25!] seconds, you move 25% faster. Each second that you are moving , you lose 1 Energy.
1370.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...22...25!] seconds.) You move 25% faster. Lose 1 Energy each second while moving.

1081.name: Teinai's Wind
1081.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take [!10...34...40!] cold damage. Burning foes struck by Teinai's Wind take an additional [!40...72...80!] damage and are interrupted.
1081.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] cold damage. Burning foes take + [!40...72...80!] damage and are interrupted. Also strikes adjacent.

228.name: Thunderclap
228.desc_full: Elite Spell. Create a massive shockwave at target foe 's location. Deals [!10...42...50!] lightning damage to target and all adjacent foes. Struck foes are interrupted and suffer from Cracked Armor and Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
228.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...42...50!] lightning damage. Also strikes adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor and Weakness ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Causes interrupt. 25% armor penetration.

163.name: Whirlwind
163.desc_full: Spell. All adjacent foes take [!15...63...75!] cold damage. Attacking foes struck by Whirlwind are knocked down. If you are Overcast , this spell strikes nearby instead of adjacent.
163.desc_concise: Spell. Hits foes adjacent to you. Deals [!15...63...75!] cold damage. Causes knock-down to attacking foes. Strikes nearby instead of adjacent if Overcast.

160.name: Windborne Speed
160.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...11...13!] seconds, target ally moves 33% faster.
160.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...11...13!] seconds.) Target ally moves 33% faster.

174.name: Aftershock
174.desc_full: Spell. Nearby foes are struck for [!26...85...100!] earth damage. Knocked down foes are struck for [!10...56...68!] additional earth damage.
174.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!26...85...100!] earth damage to nearby foes. Deals [!10...56...68!] more earth damage to knocked down foes.

165.name: Armor of Earth
165.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, you gain [!24...53...60!] armor , but move [!50...21...14!] % slower.
165.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You have + [!24...53...60!] armor. You move [!50...21...14!] % slower.

1085.name: Ash Blast
1085.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for [!35...59...65!] earth damage. Burning foes struck by Ash Blast are hexed for 5 seconds and have a [!20...64...75!] % chance to miss with attacks.
1085.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Deals [!35...59...65!] earth damage. Burning foes are hexed for 5 seconds and miss [!20...64...75!] % of attacks. Also strikes adjacent.

844.name: Churning Earth
844.desc_full: Spell. Create Churning Earth at target foe 's location. For the next 5 seconds, Churning Earth strikes foes near that location for [!10...34...40!] earth damage each second. Any foe moving faster than normal when struck by Churning Earth is knocked down.
844.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Causes knock-down to foes moving faster than normal.

217.name: Crystal Wave
217.desc_full: Spell. Foes adjacent to you are struck for [!10...58...70!] damage but are cured of any negative conditions. Each condition removed deals [!5...13...15!] damage.
217.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...58...70!] damage to all foes adjacent to you. Those foes lose all conditions and take [!5...13...15!] damage for each condition removed.

1086.name: Dragon's Stomp
1086.desc_full: Spell. You invoke a Dragon's Stomp at target foe 's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for [!26...85...100!] earth damage.
1086.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!26...85...100!] earth damage. Causes knock-down. Also hits foes near this foe.

169.name: Earth Attunement
169.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!36...55...60!] seconds, you are attuned to Earth. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Earth Magic.
169.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!36...55...60!] seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use an Earth Magic skill.

2000.name: Earthen Shackles
2000.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 3 seconds, target and all nearby foes move 90% slower. When Earthen Shackles ends , it applies Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
2000.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Target and nearby foes move 90% slower. Applies Weakness for [!5...17...20!] seconds when it ends.

170.name: Earthquake
170.desc_full: Spell. You invoke an Earthquake at target foe 's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for [!26...85...100!] earth damage.
170.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!26...85...100!] earth damage. Also hits foes near target. Causes knock-down.

1374.name: Ebon Hawk
1374.desc_full: Spell. Send a projectile that strikes target foe for [!10...70...85!] earth damage and causes Weakness for [!5...13...15!] seconds if it hits.
1374.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!10...70...85!] earth damage and inflicts Weakness condition ( [!5...13...15!] seconds).

167.name: Eruption
167.desc_full: Spell. Cause an Eruption at target foe 's location. Each second for 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for [!10...34...40!] earth damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.
167.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds).

1661.name: Glowstone
1661.desc_full: Spell. Send a projectile that strikes for [!5...41...50!] earth damage if it hits. If this spell hits a weakened [ sic ] foe , you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
1661.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!5...41...50!] earth damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Weakened.

173.name: Grasping Earth
173.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, all nearby foes move 50% slower.
173.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Hexes foes near you for ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). These foes move 50% slower.

216.name: Iron Mist
216.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!8...14...15!] seconds, you have +15 armor. Your Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.
216.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...14...15!] seconds.) Gain +15 armor. Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.

166.name: Kinetic Armor
166.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, you gain + [!20...68...80!] armor. Whenever you cast a spell , Kinetic Armor is renewed for 8 seconds.
166.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) You have + [!20...68...80!] armor. Renewal bonus: cast a spell.

168.name: Magnetic Aura
168.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!1...4...5!] second[s], you block the next attack against you and deal [!10...42...50!] damage to your attacker. If you are Overcast , all party members in earshot are also enchanted.
168.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!1...4...5!] second[s].) Block the next attack against you and reflect [!10...42...50!] damage to the attacker. If you are Overcast, enchant party members in earshot.

2190.name: Magnetic Surge
2190.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. Target foe takes [!15...63...75!] damage. If you are Overcast , Magnetic Surge enchants all allies in earshot for [!1...4...5!] second[s] to block the next attack against them.
2190.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Deals [!15...63...75!] damage. If you are Overcast, allies in earshot are enchanted for [!1...4...5!] [ sic ] and block the next attack against them.

219.name: Obsidian Flame
219.desc_full: Spell. Deal [!22...94...112!] damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

218.name: Obsidian Flesh
218.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells , but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.
218.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) You have +20 armor and enemy spells cannot target you. You cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.

1372.name: Sandstorm
1372.desc_full: Elite Spell. Create a Sandstorm at target foe 's location. For 10 seconds, nearby foes are struck for [!10...26...30!] earth damage each second and attacking foes are struck for an additional [!10...26...30!] earth damage each second.
1372.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...26...30!] earth damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes near target foe's initial location. Hits attacking foes for [!10...26...30!] more earth damage each second.

937.name: Shockwave
937.desc_full: Elite Spell. All foes in the area take [!15...51...60!] earth damage and are Weakened for [!1...8...10!] second[s]. Nearby foes also take + [!15...51...60!] earth damage and have Cracked Armor for [!1...8...10!] second[s]. Adjacent foes suffer the previous effects, take + [!15...51...60!] earth damage, and are Blinded for [!1...8...10!] second[s].
937.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Foes in the area take [!15...51...60!] earth damage and are Weakened ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]). Nearby foes also take + [!15...51...60!] earth damage and have Cracked Armor ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]). Adjacent foes also take + [!15...51...60!] earth damage and are Blinded ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]).

1084.name: Sliver Armor
1084.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you have [!25...45...50!] % chance to block attacks and whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack one nearby foe is struck for [!5...29...35!] earth damage.
1084.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You have [!25...45...50!] % chance to block. Deals [!5...29...35!] earth damage to one nearby foe whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack.

172.name: Stone Daggers
172.desc_full: Spell. Send out two Stone Daggers. Each Stone Dagger strikes target foe for [!8...28...33!] earth damage if it hits. If you are Overcast , each projectile inflicts Bleeding for [!1...4...5!] second[s].
172.desc_concise: Spell. Two projectiles: each deals [!8...28...33!] earth damage. If Overcast, cause Bleeding for [!1...4...5!] second[s].

1373.name: Stone Sheath
1373.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, you and target ally have + [!1...24...30!] armor and are immune to critical hits. When you cast this spell , all foes near you and your target take [!15...59...70!] earth damage and are Weakened for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
1373.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Gives you and target ally + [!1...24...30!] armor and immunity to critical hits.  Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for [!15...59...70!] earth damage and are Weakened ( [!5...17...20!] seconds).

1371.name: Stone Striker
1371.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...25...30!] seconds, whenever you take or deal elemental or physical damage , that damage is converted to earth damage.
1371.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...25...30!] seconds.) Converts elemental and physical damage you take or deal to earth damage.

1375.name: Stoneflesh Aura
1375.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, damage you receive is reduced by [!1...25...31!] , and you are immune to critical attacks.
1375.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Reduces damage you take by [!1...25...31!] , and you are immune to critical hits.

171.name: Stoning
171.desc_full: Spell. Send out a large stone , striking target foe for [!45...93...105!] earth damage if it hits. If Stoning hits a foe suffering from Weakness , that foe is knocked down.
171.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!45...93...105!] earth damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened.

1099.name: Teinai's Crystals
1099.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!20...36...40!] damage. If target foe has a Water Magic hex , this spell strikes target and nearby foes for an additional [!20...36...40!] damage, and nearby foes also suffer Cracked Armor for [!5...13...15!] seconds.
1099.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!20...36...40!] damage to target. Deals + [!20...36...40!] more [ sic ] damage and causes Cracked Armor ( [!5...13...15!] seconds) nearby if that foe had a Water Magic hex.

1083.name: Unsteady Ground
1083.desc_full: Elite Spell. You create Unsteady Ground at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take [!10...34...40!] earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.
1083.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] earth damage each second (5 seconds) and causes knock-down to attacking foes. Hits foes near target's initial location.

175.name: Ward Against Elements
175.desc_full: Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Elements at your current location. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor against elemental damage.
175.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor against elemental damage. Spirits are unaffected.

177.name: Ward Against Foes
177.desc_full: Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Foes at your current location. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, non- spirit foes in this area move 50% slower.
177.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Foes in this ward move 50% slower.

176.name: Ward Against Melee
176.desc_full: Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Melee at your current location. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area have a 50% chance to block melee attacks.
176.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Allies in this ward have a 50% chance to block melee attacks. Allied spirits are not affected.

938.name: Ward of Stability
938.desc_full: Ward Spell. Create a Ward of Stability at your current location. For [!10...22...25!] seconds, non- spirit allies cannot be knocked down.
938.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!10...22...25!] seconds.) Allies in this ward cannot be knocked-down. Allied spirits are not affected.

2001.name: Ward of Weakness
2001.desc_full: Ward Spell. You create a Ward of Weakness at your current location. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, foes in this area become Weakened for [!5...17...20!] seconds whenever they take elemental damage.
2001.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Inflicts Weakened condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) to any foes that take elemental damage in this ward.

180.name: Aura of Restoration
180.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain [!0...1...1!] Energy and are healed for [!200...440...500!] % of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.
180.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain [!0...1...1!] Energy and are healed for [!200...440...500!] % of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

164.name: Elemental Attunement
164.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!25...53...60!] seconds, you are attuned to Air , Fire , Water , and Earth and gain + [!1...2...2!] to these attributes. You gain 50% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use magic associated with any of these elements.
164.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!25...53...60!] seconds.) Your elemental attributes are increased by + [!1...2...2!] . You gain 50% of the Energy cost of any Air, Earth, Fire, and Water Magic skills you use.

2193.name: Energy Blast
2193.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!1...2...2!] damage for each point of Energy you have (maximum 130 damage).
2193.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!1...2...2!] damage (maximum 130) for each point of Energy you have.

837.name: Energy Boon
837.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!36...55...60!] seconds, Energy Boon raises the maximum Health of you and target ally by [!1...3...3!] for each point of your respective maximum Energy. When this enchantment is first applied , you and your target gain [!1...10...12!] Energy. You gain an additional 1 Energy for every 2 points you have in Energy Storage.
837.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!36...55...60!] seconds.) Maximum Health for you and target ally is increased by [!1...3...3!] for each point of maximum Energy.  Initial effect: Both gain [!1...10...12!] Energy.  You gain +1 Energy for every 2 points of Energy Storage.

1377.name: Ether Prism
1377.desc_full: Elite Skill. For 3 seconds, all damage you take is reduced by 75%. When Ether Prism ends, you gain [!5...17...20!] Energy.
1377.desc_concise: Elite Skill. (3 seconds.) All damage you take is reduced by 75%. End effect: gain [!5...17...20!] Energy.

178.name: Ether Prodigy
178.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. Lose all enchantments. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, you gain +6 Energy regeneration. When Ether Prodigy ends , you lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have.
178.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) You have +6 Energy regeneration. End effect: lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have. Lose all enchantments.

181.name: Ether Renewal
181.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, each time you cast a spell , you gain [!1...3...4!] Energy and [!5...17...20!] Health for each enchantment on you.
181.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain [!1...3...4!] Energy and [!5...17...20!] Health for each enchantment on you.

199.name: Glyph of Energy
199.desc_full: Elite Glyph. Your next [!1...3...3!] spell [s] do[es] not cause Overcast and cost[s] [!10...22...25!] less Energy to cast. Your elemental attributes are increased by [!1...2...2!].
199.desc_concise: Elite Glyph. Your next [!1...3...3!] spell[s] do[es] not cause Overcast and cost[s] [!10...22...25!] less Energy. Gain [!1...2...2!] to all elemental attributes.

200.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
200.desc_full: Glyph. For the next 15 seconds, your next 2 spells cost [!10...16...18!] less Energy to cast.
200.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells cost [!10...16...18!] less Energy.

1376.name: Glyph of Restoration
1376.desc_full: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 2 spells heal you for [!30...90...105!] Health , and you are healed for [!150...350...400!] % of the Energy cost of each spell.
1376.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells heal you for [!30...90...105!] , and you are healed for [!150...350...400!] % of the Energy cost of each spell.

1378.name: Master of Magic
1378.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!1...49...61!] second[s], all of your elemental attributes are set to [!8...13...14!] and your elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.
1378.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!1...49...61!] second[s]). Your elemental attributes are set to [!8...13...14!] and elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.

825.name: Bed of Coals
825.desc_full: Spell. Create a Bed of Coals at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to target foe are struck for [!5...24...29!] fire damage each second. Any foe knocked down on the Bed of Coals is set on fire for [!3...6...7!] seconds.
825.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...24...29!] fire damage each second (5 seconds) to location of target foe. Hits foes adjacent to your target. Inflicts Burning condition ( [!3...6...7!] seconds) on knocked down foes.

1094.name: Breath of Fire
1094.desc_full: Spell. Create Breath of Fire at target foe 's current location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for [!10...34...40!] fire damage each second.
1094.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

823.name: Burning Speed
823.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you are set on fire and move [!30...42...45!] % faster. When Burning Speed ends , all adjacent foes are set on fire for [!3...8...9!] seconds.
823.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You move [!30...42...45!] % faster. You suffer from Burning (7 seconds). End effect: inflicts Burning condition ( [!3...8...9!] seconds) on adjacent foes.

182.name: Conjure Flame
182.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a fire weapon , your attacks strike for an additional [!5...17...20!] fire damage.
182.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for + [!5...17...20!] fire damage. No effect unless your weapon deals fire damage.

1091.name: Double Dragon
1091.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. Invoke the power of the Dragon. For 8 seconds, you and target ally are enchanted with Double Dragon. Adjacent foes are dealt [!5...25...30!] fire damage each second. Additionally, when you or your ally use skills that target a foe, that foe is set on fire for [!0...2...3!] second[s].
1091.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Enchants you and target ally. Adjacent foes take [!5...25...30!] fire damage each second. Skills that target a foe also inflict Burning ( [!0...2...3!] second[s]).

1663.name: Elemental Flame
1663.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!10...30...35!] seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe , that foe is set on fire for [!1...4...5!] second[s].
1663.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target .

184.name: Fire Attunement
184.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!36...55...60!] seconds, you are attuned to Fire. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Fire Magic.
184.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!36...55...60!] seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Fire Magic skill.

197.name: Fire Storm
197.desc_full: Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe 's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for [!5...29...35!] fire damage each second.
197.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...29...35!] fire damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

186.name: Fireball
186.desc_full: Spell. Send out a ball of fire that strikes target foe and all adjacent foes for [!7...91...112!] fire damage.
186.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!7...91...112!] fire damage to target and adjacent foes.

188.name: Flame Burst
188.desc_full: Spell. All nearby foes are struck for [!15...99...120!] fire damage.
188.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...99...120!] fire damage to all foes near you.

1381.name: Flame Djinn's Haste
1381.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for [!15...99...120!] fire damage. For [!8...13...14!] seconds, you move 25% faster. Flame Djinn's Haste recharges 50% faster if a foe was struck by this spell.
1381.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...13...14!] seconds.) You move 25% faster. Initial effect: deals [!15...99...120!] fire damage to foes adjacent to you. If you damage a foe with this spell, it recharges 50% faster.

194.name: Flare
194.desc_full: Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for [!20...56...65!] fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast , Flare hits adjacent foes as well.
194.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!20...56...65!] fire damage. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

1379.name: Glowing Gaze
1379.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!5...41...50!] fire damage. If that foe is on Fire , [ sic ] you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
1379.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...41...50!] fire damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Burning.

2060.name: Glyph of Immolation
2060.desc_full: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next [!1...3...4!] spell [s] that target [s] a foe also cause[s] Burning for [!1...3...4!] second[s].
2060.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next [!1...3...4!] spell[s] that target[s] a foe also inflict[s] Burning condition ( [!1...3...4!] second[s]).

191.name: Immolate
191.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!20...64...75!] fire damage and is set on fire for [!1...3...3!] second[s].
191.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!20...64...75!] fire damage. Inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...3...3!] second[s]).

179.name: Incendiary Bonds
179.desc_full: Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are struck for [!20...68...80!] fire damage and are set on fire for [!1...3...3!] second[s]. Activates early if target foe dies.
179.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: deals [!20...68...80!] fire damage and inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...3...3!] second[s]) to foes near your target. Also triggers if foe dies.

183.name: Inferno
183.desc_full: Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for [!30...114...135!] fire damage.
183.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!30...114...135!] fire damage to foes adjacent to you.

824.name: Lava Arrows
824.desc_full: Spell. Lava Arrows fly toward up to 3 foes near your target and strike for [!20...56...65!] fire damage if they hit.
824.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!20...56...65!] fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.

195.name: Lava Font
195.desc_full: Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location where this spell was cast are struck for [!5...41...50!] fire damage each second. If you are Overcast , this spell strikes nearby foes instead of adjacent ones.
195.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...41...50!] fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location. If Overcast, range increased to nearby.

845.name: Liquid Flame
845.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!7...91...112!] fire damage. If that foe is attacking or casting a spell , nearby foes are also struck for [!7...91...112!] fire damage.
845.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!7...91...112!] fire damage. Deals [!7...91...112!] fire damage to nearby foes if target was attacking or casting.

190.name: Mark of Rodgort
190.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Mark of Rodgort. For [!10...30...35!] seconds, whenever each foe is struck for fire damage , that foe is set on fire for [!1...3...4!] second[s].
190.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( [!10...30...35!] seconds). Inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...3...4!] second[s]) when these foes take fire damage.

187.name: Meteor
187.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for [!7...91...112!] fire damage and knocked down.
187.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!7...91...112!] fire damage and causes knock-down. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe.

192.name: Meteor Shower
192.desc_full: Spell. Create a Meteor Shower at target foe 's location. For 9 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for [!7...91...112!] fire damage and knocked down every 3 seconds.
192.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!7...91...112!] fire damage and causes knock-down every 3 seconds (9 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

1662.name: Mind Blast
1662.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for [!15...51...60!] fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, you gain [!1...7...8!] Energy.
1662.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!15...51...60!] fire damage. You gain [!1...7...8!] Energy if you have more Energy than target foe.

185.name: Mind Burn
185.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take [!15...51...60!] fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe and all adjacent foes take an additional [!15...51...60!] fire damage and are set on fire for [!1...8...10!] second[s].
185.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!15...51...60!] fire damage. If you have more energy than target foe, deals [!15...51...60!] more fire damage and inflicts Burning ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]). Also hits adjacent foes.

193.name: Phoenix
193.desc_full: Spell. A fiery Phoenix rises at your location and flies out to your target , exploding on impact. This explosion strikes your target and nearby foes for [!10...50...60!] fire damage. If you are Overcast , allies in the blast radius are healed for [!20...68...80!] Health.
193.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile: deals [!10...50...60!] fire damage to target and nearby foes. Heals allies for [!20...68...80!] if you are Overcast.

189.name: Rodgort's Invocation
189.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for [!15...99...120!] fire damage and set on fire for [!1...3...3!] second[s].
189.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...99...120!] fire damage. Also affects foes near your target. Inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...3...3!] second[s]).

1380.name: Savannah Heat
1380.desc_full: Elite Spell. You create Savannah Heat at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take [!5...17...20!] fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.
1380.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!5...17...20!] fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.

884.name: Searing Flames
884.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck with Searing Flames. Foes already on fire when this skill is cast are struck for [!10...82...100!] fire damage. Foes not already on fire begin Burning for [!1...6...7!] seconds.
884.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Hits foes near your target. Deals [!10...82...100!] fire damage to foes already Burning. Inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...6...7!] seconds) to foes not Burning.

196.name: Searing Heat
196.desc_full: Spell. Cause Searing Heat at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for [!10...34...40!] fire damage each second. When Searing Heat ends , foes in the area of effect are set on fire for 3 seconds.
196.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds).

1090.name: Smoldering Embers
1090.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for [!10...58...70!] fire damage. If you are Overcast , that foe is hexed with Smoldering Embers for 3 seconds and takes [!5...21...25!] additional fire damage each second.
1090.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Deals [!10...58...70!] fire damage to target. If you are Overcast, foe is hexed for 3 seconds, taking [!5...21...25!] fire damage each second.

1095.name: Star Burst
1095.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for [!7...91...112!] fire damage and set on fire for [!1...3...4!] second[s]. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.
1095.desc_concise: Elite Touch Spell. Deals [!7...91...112!] fire damage. Inflicts Burning ( [!1...3...4!] seconds). [ sic ] Gain 2 Energy for each foe struck. Also hits foes in the area.

1093.name: Teinai's Heat
1093.desc_full: Ward Spell. Place a ward of Teinai's Heat at your location for [!10...14...15!] seconds. Foes within the ward suffer [!2...4...5!] health [ sic ] degeneration. Weakened foes attack 33% slower. This skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
1093.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!10...14...15!] seconds.) Causes - [!2...4...5!] health [ sic ] degeneration. Weakened foes in the ward attack 33% slower. Disabled for 20 seconds.

206.name: Armor of Frost
206.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!10...29...34!] seconds, you gain +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.
206.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...29...34!] seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.

238.name: Armor of Mist
238.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, you gain + [!10...34...40!] armor and move 33% faster.
238.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) You have + [!10...34...40!] armor and move 33% faster.

235.name: Blurred Vision
235.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!4...9...10!] seconds, target foe and adjacent foes are hexed with Blurred Vision. While hexed, those foes have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.
235.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target ( [!4...9...10!] seconds). They have 50% chance to miss.

207.name: Conjure Frost
207.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a cold weapon , your attacks strike for an additional [!5...17...20!] cold damage.
207.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for + [!5...17...20!] cold damage. No effect unless your weapon deals cold damage.

234.name: Deep Freeze
234.desc_full: Hex Spell. You cause a Deep Freeze at target foe 's location. All foes in this area are struck for [!10...70...85!] cold damage , and for 10 seconds, they move 66% slower.
234.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes in the area of your target (10 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals [!10...70...85!] cold damage.

1382.name: Freezing Gust
1382.desc_full: Hex Spell. If target foe is under the effect of a Water Magic hex, that foe is struck for [!20...68...80!] cold damage. Otherwise, that foe moves 66% slower for [!1...4...5!] second[s].
1382.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Deals [!20...68...80!] cold damage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic. Otherwise, this foe moves 66% slower ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]).

1261.name: Frigid Armor
1261.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!10...22...25!] seconds, you have + [!10...34...40!] armor against physical damage and cannot be set on fire.
1261.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...22...25!] seconds.) You have + [!10...34...40!] armor against physical damage and immunity to Burning.

212.name: Frozen Burst
212.desc_full: Hex Spell. All nearby foes are struck for [!10...70...85!] cold damage and move 66% slower for [!3...7...8!] seconds.
212.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Hexes foes near you. These foes move 66% slower ( [!3...7...8!] seconds). Initial effect: deals [!10...70...85!] cold damage to foes near you.

2192.name: Glowing Ice
2192.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!5...41...50!] cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a Water Magic hex , you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
2192.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...41...50!] cold damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic.

210.name: Ice Prison
210.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, target foe 's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower.
210.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower.

214.name: Ice Spear
214.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. Send out an Ice Spear , striking target foe for [!10...50...60!] cold damage if it hits. If you are Overcast , you gain + [!1...3...4!] Health regeneration for 5 seconds.
214.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Projectile: deals [!10...50...60!] cold damage. Gain + [!1...3...4!] Health regeneration for 5 seconds if Overcast.

211.name: Ice Spikes
211.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for [!20...68...80!] cold damage and move 66% slower for [!2...5...6!] seconds.
211.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target ( [!2...5...6!] seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals [!20...68...80!] cold damage.

903.name: Icy Prism
903.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!15...63...75!] cold damage. If that foe has a Water Magic hex , Icy Prism deals + [ sic ] [!15...63...75!] cold damage to all other nearby foes.
903.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...63...75!] cold damage. Deals + [ sic ] [!15...63...75!] cold damage to other nearby foes if target has a Water Magic hex.

939.name: Icy Shackles
939.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...8...10!] second[s], target foe 's movement speed is reduced by 66%. While under the effects of an enchantment , that foe's movement is reduced by 90%.
939.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!1...8...10!] second[s].) Target foe moves 66% slower. This foe moves 90% slower if enchanted.

215.name: Maelstrom
215.desc_full: Spell. Create a Maelstrom at target foe 's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that area are struck for [!10...22...25!] cold damage each second. Maelstrom interrupts spell-casting when it hits.
215.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...22...25!] cold damage and interrupts spells each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

209.name: Mind Freeze
209.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes [!10...50...60!] cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional [!10...50...60!] cold damage and moves 90% slower for [!1...4...5!] second[s].
209.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Deals [!10...50...60!] cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals + [!10...50...60!] cold damage and causes 90% slower movement ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]).

1098.name: Mirror of Ice
1098.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Shatter a Mirror of Ice. All foes near you and target ally take [!15...59...70!] cold damage and move 66% slower for [!2...5...6!] seconds. If you strike a foe hexed with Water Magic , Mirror of Ice recharges 50% faster.
1098.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Deals [!15...59...70!] cold damage and slows foes by 66% ( [!2...5...6!] seconds). Hits foes near you and target ally. Recharges 50% faster if it hits a foe hexed with Water Magic.

236.name: Mist Form
236.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!10...38...45!] seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell , all non- spirit allies in earshot are healed for [!50...210...250!] % of the Energy cost of the spell.
236.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...38...45!] seconds.) Take 33% less damage from foes hexed with Water Magic. Heals non-spirit allies in earshot for [!50...210...250!] % of the energy cost of your elemental spells.

204.name: Rust
204.desc_full: Hex Spell. Deals [!10...58...70!] cold damage to target and adjacent foes. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to activate signets. If you are Overcast , foes struck with Rust have their signets interrupted and disabled for [!1...8...10!] second[s].
204.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Deals [!10...58...70!] cold damage to target and adjacent foes. Hexes target and adjacent foes ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Doubles signet activation time. Interrupts and disables signets for [!1...8...10!] second[s] if you are Overcast.

213.name: Shard Storm
213.desc_full: Hex Spell. Send out an ice shard that strikes target foe for [!10...70...85!] cold damage if it hits and causing target foe to move 66% slower for [!2...5...6!] seconds.
213.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Projectile: deals [!10...70...85!] cold damage. Target foe moves 66% slower ( [!2...5...6!] seconds).

809.name: Shatterstone
809.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for [!25...85...100!] cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for [!25...85...100!] cold damage.
809.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Initial effect: deals [!25...85...100!] cold damage. End effect: deals [!25...85...100!] cold damage to target and all nearby foes.

2191.name: Slippery Ground
2191.desc_full: Spell. If target or adjacent foes are Blind or moving , these foes are knocked down. There is a 50% chance of failure with Water Magic less than 5.
2191.desc_concise: Spell. Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. Affects foes adjacent to your target. 50% failure chance unless Water Magic greater than 4.

846.name: Steam
846.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!20...52...60!] cold damage. If target foe is on fire , Steam Blinds that foe for [!5...9...10!] seconds.
846.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!20...52...60!] cold damage. Inflicts Blindness condition ( [!5...9...10!] seconds) if target foe is Burning.

233.name: Swirling Aura
233.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, you are enchanted with Swirling Aura and have [!1...5...6!] Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block projectiles. If you are Overcast when you cast this spell, all party members in earshot are also enchanted.
233.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds.) Gives [!1...5...6!] Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block projectiles. If Overcast, also enchants party members in earshot.

1097.name: Teinai's Prison
1097.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!1...5...6!] second[s], target foe 's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower. If that foe has Cracked Armor , the chill seeps through causing [!5...8...9!] Health degeneration.
1097.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!1...5...6!] second[s].) Target foe moves 66% slower. Foes with Cracked Armor have [!5...8...9!] Health degeneration.

866.name: Vapor Blade
866.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!15...111...135!] cold damage. Vapor Blade deals half damage if that foe has any enchantments on them.
866.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!15...111...135!] cold damage. Half damage if target foe is enchanted.

239.name: Ward Against Harm
239.desc_full: Elite Ward Spell. Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area have + [!1...3...3!] health regeneration , + [!12...22...24!] armor , and an additional + [!12...22...24!] armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 20 seconds.
239.desc_concise: Elite Ward Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Allies in this ward have + [!1...3...3!] Health regeneration, + [!12...22...24!] armor, and + [!12...22...24!] additional armor against elemental damage. Spirits are unaffected. This spell is disabled for 20 seconds.

208.name: Water Attunement
208.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!36...55...60!] seconds, you are attuned to Water. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Water Magic.
208.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!36...55...60!] seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Water Magic skill.

237.desc_full: Elite Spell. Send out a fast-moving Water Trident , striking target foe and up to 2 adjacent foes for [!10...74...90!] cold damage if it hits. If it hits a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.
237.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Fast Projectile: deals [!10...74...90!] cold damage and knocks-down moving foes. Shoots 2 additional projectiles at adjacent foes.

1999.name: Winter's Embrace
1999.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!2...5...6!] seconds, target foe moves 66% slower and takes [!5...13...15!] damage while moving.
1999.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!2...5...6!] seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower and takes [!5...13...15!] damage while moving.

201.name: Glyph of Concentration
201.desc_full: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and ignores the effects of being Dazed.
201.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and is unaffected by the Dazed condition.

198.name: Glyph of Elemental Power
198.desc_full: Glyph. For 25 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 2 for your next 10 spells.
198.desc_concise: Glyph. (25 seconds.) Boosts your elemental attributes by +2 for your next 10 spells.

1096.desc_full: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly but causes you to lose all Energy.
1096.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly. You lose all Energy.

203.name: Glyph of Renewal

203.desc_concise: Elite Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell recharges instantly.

202.desc_concise: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly but takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. Ends if you use a non-spell skill.

1088.desc_concise: Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Overcast. You lose all enchantments.

1639.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next [!1...8...10!] attack skills each remove one condition.

779.name: Black Lotus Strike

779.desc_concise: Lead Attack. Deals + [!10...27...31!] damage. You gain [!5...11...13!] Energy if target foe is hexed.

1027.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!4...9...10!] seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

1018.desc_concise: Skill. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) You have + [!3...13...15!] % chance to land a critical hit.  You gain 1 Energy whenever you land a critical hit.

1019.desc_concise: Dual Attack. Deals + [!10...26...30!] damage. Automatic critical hit. You gain [!1...3...3!] Energy. Must follow an off-hand attack.

1029.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!3...14...17!] seconds.) Your critical hits remove an enchantment. Removal cost: lose [![!10...5...4!]!] Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.

1638.name: Deadly Haste

1638.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) Your half-ranged spells cast [!5...41...50!] % faster and recharge [!5...41...50!] % faster.

1030.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) You have +50% chance to double strike. No effect unless you are wielding daggers.

1045.desc_concise: Elite Touch Skill. Deals [!10...54...65!] damage and inflicts Crippled condition ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

926.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...25...30!] seconds.) Your dagger attacks inflict the Bleeding condition ( [!5...13...15!] seconds).

1649.name: Way of the Assassin

1649.desc_concise: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) While wielding daggers, you attack [!5...17...20!] % faster and have + [!5...29...35!] % chance to land a critical hit.

2187.name: Way of the Master

2187.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) While holding a non-dagger weapon, you have + [!3...27...33!] % chance to land a critical hit.

1042.name: Flashing Blades

1042.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...25...30!] seconds.) You have 75% chance to block while attacking. Block effect: [!5...17...20!] damage to your attacker.

780.name: Fox Fangs

780.desc_concise: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + [!10...30...35!] damage. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

1640.name: Fox's Promise

1640.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell.  ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.)  Your dagger attacks are unblockable. Ends the next time you fail to hit.

1988.name: Golden Fang Strike

1988.desc_concise: Off-Hand Attack.  Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if you are enchanted. Must follow a lead attack.

1637.name: Golden Fox Strike

1637.desc_concise: Lead Attack. Deals + [!10...26...30!] damage. Unblockable if you are Enchanted.

1026.name: Golden Lotus Strike

1026.desc_concise: Lead Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. You gain [!5...7...8!] Energy if you are enchanted.

989.name: Golden Phoenix Strike

1635.desc_concise: Elite Off-Hand Attack.  Inflicts Dazed condition ( [!1...4...5!] seconds). No effect unless you are enchanted.

1987.name: Lotus Strike

986.desc_concise: Dual Attack. Deals + [!15...35...40!] damage. Unblockable. Must follow an off-hand attack.

976.name: Repeating Strike

976.desc_concise: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + [!10...26...30!] damage. This skill has +15 second recharge time if it misses. Must follow an off-hand attack.

2135.name: Trampling Ox

2135.desc_concise: Dual Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage; causes knock-down if target foe is Crippled. Must follow an off-hand attack.

1022.desc_concise: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + [!10...30...35!] damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

1035.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) You gain [!5...17...20!] Energy and all your skills recharge if target foe dies.

1646.name: Augury of Death

1646.desc_concise: Half Range Hex Spell. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) Inflict Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) and Shadow Step to target foe the next time damage would drop this foe's Health below 50%.

1038.name: Crippling Dagger

1038.desc_concise: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals [!15...51...60!] earth damage. Inflicts Crippled condition ( [!3...13...15!] seconds) if target foe is moving.

858.desc_concise: Half Range Spell. Three projectiles: each deals [!5...29...35!] earth damage. Counts as a lead attack.

1044.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 33% slower ( [!1...5...6!] seconds).

572.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster. Disables your attack skills (10 seconds).

571.desc_concise: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals [!10...30...35!] earth damage. Interrupts a skill.

800.name: Enduring Toxin

800.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration. Renewal: if the target foe is moving when this hex ends.

784.desc_concise: Spell. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Must follow a lead attack.

802.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!1...9...11!] second[s].) Target foe cannot block your attacks.

990.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Removes one enchantment for each non-attack skill you have. All your non-attack skills are disabled ( [![!10...6...5!]!] seconds).

1033.name: Impale

1033.desc_concise: Skill. Deals [!25...85...100!] earth damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). Must follow a dual attack.

786.name: Iron Palm

786.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!5...41...50!] damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is hexed or has a condition. Counts as a lead attack.

974.desc_concise: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack. Must follow a lead attack.

2412.desc_concise: Spell. ( [!10...20!] seconds.) Disables one Spell. This skill becomes that Spell. You gain [!5...10!] Energy.
