2226.desc_full: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Ice Imp that lives for [!40...60!] seconds and has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.
2226.desc_concise: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Ice Imp ( [!40...60!] lifespan) that has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2224.name: Summon Mursaat
2224.desc_full: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Mursaat that lives for [!40...60!] seconds and has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active at a time.
2224.desc_concise: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Mursaat ( [!40...60!] lifespan) that has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2227.name: Summon Naga Shaman
2227.desc_full: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Naga Shaman that lives for [!40...60!] seconds and has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.
2227.desc_concise: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Naga Shaman ( [!40...60!] lifespan) that has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2225.name: Summon Ruby Djinn
2225.desc_full: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Ruby Djinn that lives for [!40...60!] seconds and has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active at a time.
2225.desc_concise: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Ruby Djinn ( [!40...60!] lifespan) that has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2413.name: Technobabble
2413.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for [!30...40!] damage. If target foe is not a boss , that foe and all adjacent foes are Dazed for [!3...5!] seconds.
2413.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!30...40!] damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Dazed condition ( [!3...5!] seconds) on these foes if target was not a boss.

2217.name: "By Ural's Hammer!"
2217.desc_full: Shout. For 30 seconds, all dead party members in earshot are resurrected with full Health and Energy. Resurrected party members deal [!25...33!] % more damage. When this effect ends, affected party members die. This skill does not incur a death penalty.
2217.desc_concise: Shout. (30 seconds.) Resurrect all dead party members in earshot with full Health and Energy. Affected party members deal [!25...33!] % more damage. Affected party members die when it ends, but do not receive a death penalty.

2216.name: "Don't Trip!"
2216.desc_full: Shout. For [!3...5!] seconds, party members within earshot cannot be knocked down.
2216.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!3...5!] seconds.) Prevents knock-down; affects party members within earshot.

2211.name: Alkar's Alchemical Acid
2211.desc_full: Spell. Throw Alkar 's Alchemical Acid at target foe. Target and adjacent foes are struck for [!40...50!] damage. Destroyers take an additional [!45...70!] damage and they have Cracked Armor for [!14...20!] seconds.
2211.desc_concise: Spell. Projectile : deals [!40...50!] damage to target and adjacent foes. Deals [!45...70!] more damage and inflicts Cracked Armor condition ( [!14...20!] seconds) to Destroyers.

2223.name: Black Powder Mine
2223.desc_full: Trap. When Black Powder Mine is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for [!20...30!] damage , become Blinded , and begin Bleeding for [!7...10!] seconds. Black Powder Mine ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2223.desc_concise: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals [!20...30!] damage. Inflicts Blindness and Bleeding conditions ( [!7...10!] seconds). Easily interrupted.

2215.name: Brawling Headbutt
2215.desc_full: Skill. You headbutt target touched foe dealing [!45...70!] damage and knocking down that foe if it hits.
2215.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!45...70!] damage; causes knock-down.

2221.name: Breath of the Great Dwarf
2221.desc_full: Spell. All party members are relieved of Burning and are healed for [!50...60!] Health.
2221.desc_concise: Spell. Removes burning and heals for [!50...60!] Health. Affects party members.

2218.name: Drunken Master
2218.desc_full: Stance. For [!72...90!] seconds, your movement and attack speeds are increased by [!10...15!] %. If you are drunk while activating this skill, your movement and attack speeds are increased by [!25...33!] % instead.
2218.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!72...90!] seconds.) You move and attack [!10...15!] % faster if you are not drunk. You move and attack [!25...33!] % faster if you are drunk.

2423.name: Dwarven Stability
2423.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!24...30!] seconds, your stances last [!55...100!] % longer. If you activated this skill while drunk , you cannot be knocked down.
2423.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!24...30!] seconds.) Your stances last [!55...100!] % longer. You cannot be knocked-down if you activated this skill while drunk . [ sic ]

2213.name: Ear Bite
2213.desc_full: Skill. Target touched foe takes [!50...70!] piercing damage and begins Bleeding for [!15...25!] seconds.
2213.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!50...70!] piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition ( [!15...25!] seconds).

2220.name: Great Dwarf Armor
2220.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!22...40!] seconds, target ally has +24 armor , +60 maximum Health , and an additional +24 armor against Destroyers.
2220.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell.  ( [!22...40!] seconds.)  +24 armor and +60 maximum Health.  Additional +24 armor against Destroyers.

2219.name: Great Dwarf Weapon
2219.desc_full: Weapon Spell. For 20 seconds, target other ally 's weapon strikes for + [!15...20!] damage and has a [!28...40!] % chance to cause knock down.
2219.desc_concise: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) + [!15...20!] weapon damage and [!28...40!] % chance to cause knock-down with attacks. Cannot self-target.

2212.name: Light of Deldrimor
2212.desc_full: Spell. All foes in the area are struck for [!55...80!] holy damage. The location of hidden objects are briefly indicated on your Compass. Any hidden objects in the area are revealed.
2212.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!55...80!] holy damage to foes in the area. Pings hidden objects within the area on the compass.

2214.name: Low Blow
2214.desc_full: Skill. Strike target foe for [!45...70!] damage. If target foe is knocked down , that foe takes an additional [!30...50!] damage and suffers from Cracked Armor for [!14...20!] seconds.
2214.desc_concise: Touch Skill. Deals [!45...70!] damage. Inflicts [!30...50!] damage and Cracked Armor ( [!14...20!] seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

2222.name: Snow Storm
2222.desc_full: Spell. Create a Snow Storm at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for [!30...40!] cold damage each second.
2222.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!30...40!] cold damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target foe's initial location.

2228.name: Deft Strike
2228.desc_full: Ranged Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes [!18...30!] damage. If that foe has Cracked Armor , it begins Bleeding for [!18...30!] seconds.
2228.desc_concise: Ranged Attack. Deals [!18...30!] damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition ( [!18...30!] seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2231.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Courage
2231.desc_full: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Courage at your current location. For [!14...20!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor and an additional +24 armor against Charr.
2231.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!14...20!] seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor and +24 more armor against Charr. Spirits are unaffected.

2233.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Honor
2233.desc_full: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Honor at your current location. For [!14...20!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area strike for + [!8...15!] damage and an additional + [!7...10!] vs. Charr.
2233.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!14...20!] seconds.) Allies in this ward deal + [!8...15!] damage and + [!7...10!] more damage against Charr. Spirits are unaffected.

2232.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom
2232.desc_full: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom at your current location. For [!14...20!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area have a [!44...60!] % chance to halve skill recharge of spells they cast.
2232.desc_concise: Ward Spell. ( [!14...20!] seconds.) Spells that allies in this ward cast have a [!44...60!] % chance to recharge 50% faster. Spirits are unaffected.

2420.name: Ebon Escape
2420.desc_full: Spell. Shadow Step to target other ally. You and that other ally are healed for [!70...110!] health.
2420.desc_concise: Spell. Heals you and target ally for [!70...110!] . Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally. Cannot self-target.

2235.name: Ebon Vanguard Assassin Support
2235.desc_full: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] Ebon Vanguard Assassin that has Iron Palm , Fox Fangs , and Nine Tail Strike. This summoned Assassin Shadow Steps to target foe. If that foe is a Charr , the Assassin lives for [!24...30!] seconds. If target foe is not a Charr , the Assassin lives for [!12...15!] seconds.
2235.desc_concise: Spell. Summon a level [!14...20!] assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike; it Shadow Steps to this foe. If this foe is a Charr, the assassin lives for [!24...30!] seconds. If target foe is not a Charr, the Assassin lives for [!12...15!] seconds.

2234.name: Ebon Vanguard Sniper Support
2234.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!54...90!] piercing damage and begins Bleeding for [!5...25!] seconds. This attack has a 10% chance of doing an additional + [!540...900!] piercing damage. If this attack hits a Charr it has a 25% chance of doing an additional + [!540...900!] piercing damage.
2234.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!54...90!] piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition ( [!5...25!] seconds). 10% chance of + [!540...900!] piercing damage. 25% chance of + [!540...900!] piercing damage if target foe is a Charr.

2229.name: Signet of Infection
2229.desc_full: Signet. If target foe is Bleeding , that foe is Diseased for [!13...20!] seconds.
2229.desc_concise: Signet. Inflicts Diseased condition [!13...20!] seconds if target foe is Bleeding.

2116.name: Sneak Attack
2116.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Blinded for [!5...8!] seconds. This attack counts as a lead attack.
2116.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Inflicts Blindness ( [!5...8!] seconds). Counts as a lead attack.

2230.name: Tryptophan Signet
2230.desc_full: Signet. For [!14...20!] seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes move and attack [!23...40!] % slower.
2230.desc_concise: Signet. ( [!14...20!] seconds.) Target and adjacent foes move and attack [!23...40!] % slower.

2421.name: Weakness Trap
2421.desc_full: Trap. When Weakness Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are Weakened for [!10...20!] seconds and take [!24...50!] lightning damage. All Charr are knocked down. Weakness Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill , you are easily interrupted.
2421.desc_concise: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals [!24...50!] lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!10...20!] seconds). Knocks-down Charr. Easily interrupted.

2422.name: Winds
2422.desc_full: Ebon Vanguard Ritual. Create a level [!4...10!] Spirit. All foes within its range have 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks. This spirit dies after [!54...90!] seconds.
2422.desc_concise: Ebon Vanguard Ritual. Creates a level [!4...10!] spirit ( [!54...90!] second lifespan.) Affects foes within range. 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks.

2354.name: "Dodge This!"
2354.desc_full: Shout. For [!16...20!] seconds, your next attack cannot be blocked and does + [!14...20!] damage.
2354.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!16...20!] seconds.) Your next attack is unblockable and deals + [!14...20!] damage.

2353.name: "Finish Him!"
2353.desc_full: Shout. If target foe has less than 50% Health , that foe takes [!44...80!] damage and suffers from Cracked Armor and a Deep Wound for [!12...20!] seconds.
2353.desc_concise: Shout. Deals [!44...80!] damage and inflicts Cracked Armor and Deep Wound conditions ( [!12...20!] seconds). No effect unless target foe has less than 50% Health.

2355.name: "I Am the Strongest!"
2355.desc_full: Shout. Your next [!5...8!] attacks do an additional + [!14...20!] damage.
2355.desc_concise: Shout. Your next [!5...8!] attacks deal + [!14...20!] damage.

2356.name: "I Am Unstoppable!"
2356.desc_full: Shout. For [!16...20!] seconds, you have +24 armor and cannot be knocked down or Crippled.
2356.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!16...20!] seconds.) You have +24 armor and cannot be knocked-down or Crippled.

2359.name: "You Are All Weaklings!"
2359.desc_full: Shout. Target foe and foes adjacent to target are Weakened for [!8...12!] seconds.
2359.desc_concise: Shout. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!8...12!] seconds). Also affects adjacent foes.

2358.name: "You Move Like a Dwarf!"
2358.desc_full: Shout. Target foe is knocked down and takes [!44...80!] damage. That foe is also Crippled for [!8...15!] seconds.
2358.desc_concise: Shout. Deals [!44...80!] damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Crippled condition ( [!8...15!] seconds).

2357.name: A Touch of Guile
2357.desc_full: Hex Spell. Target touched foe takes [!44...80!] damage. If target foe was knocked down , that foe cannot attack for [!5...8!] seconds.
2357.desc_concise: Touch Hex Spell. Deals [!44...80!] damage. Target foe cannot attack ( [!5...7...8!] seconds) if it was knocked-down.

2361.name: Club of a Thousand Bears
2361.desc_full: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, it deals + [!6...9!] damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). If target foe is non- human it is knocked down.
2361.desc_concise: Melee Attack. Deals + [!6...9!] damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). Causes knock-down if target foe is non-human.

2360.name: Feel No Pain
2360.desc_full: Skill. For 30 seconds you have + [!2...3!] Health regeneration. If you are drunk when activating this skill, you also have + [!200...300!] maximum Health.
2360.desc_concise: Skill. (30 seconds.) You have + [!2...3!] Health regeneration. You have + [!200...300!] maximum Health if you are drunk when activating this skill.

2384.name: Raven Blessing
2384.desc_full: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the raven. For 60 seconds, you have 80 armor , [!660...700!] Health , and a [!20...30!] % chance to block , All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills.
2384.desc_concise: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the Raven (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, [!660...700!] Health, and a [!20...30!] % block chance.

2374.name: Ursan Blessing
2374.desc_full: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear. For 60 seconds, you have 100 armor and [!750...790...800!] Health. All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills.
2374.desc_concise: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills, and you have 100 armor and [!750...790...800!] Health.

2379.name: Volfen Blessing
2379.desc_full: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf. For 60 seconds, you have 80 armor , [!660...700!] Health , and [!2...4!] Health regeneration. All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills.
2379.desc_concise: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, [!660...700!] Health and [!2...4!] Health regeneration.

2808.name: Enraged Smash (PvP)
2808.desc_full: Elite Hammer Attack. If Enraged Smash hits, you gain [!1...3...4!] strike[s] of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe , you strike for + [!10...34...40!] damage , and target foe is knocked down.
2808.desc_concise: Elite Hammer Attack. Gives you [!1...3...4!] strike[s] of adrenaline if you hit. Deals + [!10...34...40!] damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

3143.name: Renewing Smash (PvP)
3143.desc_full: Hammer Attack. If Renewing Smash hits, it deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. If it hits a knocked-down foe , you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.
3143.desc_concise: Hammer Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. You gain 3 energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

3204.name: Defy Pain (PvP)
3204.desc_full: Elite Stance. For 20 seconds you have an additional [!90...258...300!] Health and an additional 20 armor.
3204.desc_concise: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) You have + [!90...258...300!] maximum Health and +20 armor.

3002.name: Warrior's Endurance (PvP)
3002.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!5...29...35!] seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above [!10...22...25!].
3002.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!5...29...35!] seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. No Energy gain if you have more than [![!10...22...25!]!] Energy.

2858.name: "Watch Yourself!" (PvP)
2858.desc_full: Shout. Party members within earshot gain + [!5...21...25!] armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after [!1...3...3!] incoming attack [s].
2858.desc_concise: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have + [!5...21...25!] armor. Ends after [![!1...3...3!]!] incoming attack[s].

3156.name: Soldier's Stance (PvP)
3156.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!4...9...10!] seconds, you attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
3156.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!4...9...10!] seconds.) You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.

2883.name: "For Great Justice!" (PvP)
2883.desc_full: Shout. For 8 seconds, when you hit with an attack , you gain 1 additional strike of adrenaline.
2883.desc_concise: Shout. (8 seconds.) You gain 1 extra strike of adrenaline whenever you hit with an attack.

2657.name: Call of Haste (PvP)
2657.desc_full: Shout. For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 25% faster attack speed and moves 25% faster.
2657.desc_concise: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 25% faster.

3068.name: Charm Animal (Codex)
3068.desc_full: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped and have at least 8 points in Beast Mastery.
3068.desc_concise: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. Failure unless Beast Mastery 8 or higher.

3045.name: Comfort Animal (PvP)
3045.desc_full: Skill. You heal your animal companion for [!20...87...104!] Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with [!10...48...58!] % Health.
3045.desc_concise: Skill. Your pet gains [!20...87...104!] Health. Resurrects your pet ( [!10...48...58!] % Health.)

3051.name: Enraged Lunge (PvP)
3051.desc_full: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that deals + [!3...19...23!] damage (maximum bonus 80) for each recharging Beast Mastery skill.
3051.desc_concise: Elite Pet Attack. Deals + [!3...19...23!] damage (maximum 80) for each of your recharging Beast Mastery skills.

3144.name: Heal as One (PvP)
3144.desc_full: Elite Skill. If you or your animal companion are below 75% Health , you are both healed for [!25...121...145!] Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health.
3144.desc_concise: Elite Skill. Heals you and your pet for [!25...121...145!] . If your pet is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health. No effect if neither you nor your pet are below 75% Health.

3047.name: Melandru's Assault (PvP)
3047.desc_full: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Melandru 's Assault that deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. If that attack strikes a foe with an enchantment , that foe and all adjacent foes take + [!5...29...35!] additional damage.
3047.desc_concise: Pet Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Deals + [!5...29...35!] more damage to target and foes adjacent to target if this foe is enchanted.

3050.name: Predatory Bond (PvP)
3050.desc_full: Shout. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, attacks by your animal companion heal you for [!1...25...31!] Health.
3050.desc_concise: Shout. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) You gain [!1...25...31!] Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.

2959.name: Expert's Dexterity (PvP)
2959.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!1...16...20!] second[s], you attack 15% faster and your Marksmanship attribute is increased by 1.
2959.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!1...16...20!] second[s].) You attack 15% faster and you gain +1 to your Marksmanship attribute.

3060.name: Escape (PvP)
3060.desc_full: Elite Stance. For [!1...7...8!] second[s], you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Escape ends if you make a melee attack.
3060.desc_concise: Elite Stance. ( [!1...7...8!] second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block. Ends if you make a melee attack.

3145.name: Glass Arrows (PvP)
3145.desc_full: Elite Preparation. For [!10...30...35!] seconds, your arrows strike for + [!5...11...12!] damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for [!10...18...20!] seconds if they are blocked.
3145.desc_concise: Elite Preparation. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) Your arrows deal + [!5...11...12!] damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked ( [!10...18...20!] seconds).

3141.name: Lightning Reflexes (PvP)
3141.desc_full: Stance. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks , and you attack 33% faster.
3141.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

2861.name: Penetrating Attack (PvP)
2861.desc_full: Bow Attack. If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for + [!3...9...10!] damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
2861.desc_concise: Bow Attack. Deals + [!3...9...10!] damage. 10% armor penetration.

2969.name: Read the Wind (PvP)
2969.desc_full: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast.
2969.desc_concise: Preparation. (24 seconds). Your arrows move twice as fast.

2925.name: Sloth Hunter's Shot (PvP)
2925.desc_full: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes + [!5...17...20!] damage. If that foe is not using a skill , Sloth Hunter's Shot does an additional + [!5...13...15!] damage.
2925.desc_concise: Bow Attack. Deals + [!5...17...20!] damage. Deals + [!5...13...15!] more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

2864.name: Sundering Attack (PvP)
2864.desc_full: Bow Attack. If Sundering Attack hits, you strike for + [!3...9...10!] damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
2864.desc_concise: Bow Attack. Deals + [!3...9...10!] damage. 10% armor penetration.

3147.name: Keen Arrow (PvP)
3147.desc_full: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + [!1...4...5!] damage. If you land a critical hit , you deal an additional + [!5...25...30!] damage.
3147.desc_concise: Bow Attack. Deals + [!1...4...5!] damage. Deals + [!5...25...30!] more damage if you land a critical hit.

2895.name: Smiter's Boon (PvP)
2895.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, your Smiting Prayers have double the Divine Favor bonus.
2895.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

2891.name: Unyielding Aura (PvP)
2891.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. If you stop maintaining this enchantment or if this enchantment is removed, that party member dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Deaths while enchanted with Unyielding Aura do not incur a death penalty. (50% failure chance with Divine Favor 4 or less.)
2891.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). End effect: this ally dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Does not incur a death penalty. 50% failure chance unless Divine Favor 5 or more.

2871.name: Light of Deliverance (PvP)
2871.desc_full: Elite Spell. All party members are healed for [!5...57...70!] Health. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.
2871.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for [!5...57...70!] . Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).

3232.name: Heal Party (PvP)
3232.desc_full: Spell. Heal entire party for [!30...66...75!] Health.

2857.name: Aegis (PvP)
2857.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!1...3...3!] seconds, target other party member cannot be the target of hostile spells , and attacks against this party member fail.
2857.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!1...3...3!] seconds). Target party member cannot be targeted by hostile spells. Attacks against this party member fail. Cannot self-target.

2892.name: Spirit Bond (PvP)
2892.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage from the next 10 attacks or spells , that ally is healed for [!30...78...90!] Health.
2892.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for [!30...78...90!] whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.

2887.name: Signet of Judgment (PvP)
2887.desc_full: Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take [!5...41...50!] holy damage. This signet has half the normal range.
2887.desc_concise: Elite Half Range Signet. Knocks down target. Deals [!5...41...50!] holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

2999.name: Strength of Honor (PvP)
2999.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals [!1...4...5!] more damage in melee.
2999.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals [!1...4...5!] more damage in melee.

3059.name: Signet of Agony (PvP)
3059.desc_full: Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take [!10...58...70!] damage.
3059.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!10...58...70!] damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

3233.name: Spoil Victor (PvP)
3233.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!3...13...15!] seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health that foe loses [!15...63...75!] Health.
3233.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!3...13...15!] seconds.) Causes [!15...63...75!] Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

3058.name: Unholy Feast (PvP)
3058.desc_full: Spell. Steal up to [!10...54...65!] Health from up to [!1...3...4!] foes [ sic ] in the area.
3058.desc_concise: Spell. Steals [!10...54...65!] Health from [!1...3...4!] foe[s] in the area around you.

2859.name: Enfeeble (PvP)
2859.desc_full: Spell. Target suffers from Weakness for [!10...26...30!] seconds.

2885.name: Enfeebling Blood (PvP)
2885.desc_full: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for [!1...13...16!] second[s].
2885.desc_concise: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition ( [!1...13...16!] second[s]) on this foe and nearby foes.

2863.name: Discord (PvP)
2863.desc_full: Elite Spell. If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment , that foe suffers [!30...94...110!] damage.
2863.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!30...94...110!] damage. No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.

3054.name: Masochism (PvP)
3054.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, you gain [!1...3...3!] Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.
3054.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You gain [!1...3...3!] Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.

3151.name: Empathy (PvP)
3151.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, whenever target foe attacks , that foe takes [!15...39...45!] damage.
3151.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Target foe takes [!15...39...45!] damage whenever it attacks.

3192.name: Enchanter's Conundrum (PvP)
3192.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe casts enchantments [!100...180...200!] % slower. If target foe is not under the effects of an enchantment when this hex is applied, that foe and all adjacent foes take [!10...82...100!] damage.
3192.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Causes [!100...180...200!] % slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals [!10...82...100!] damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

2734.name: Mind Wrack (PvP)
2734.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...33...40!] seconds, whenever this foe is the target of one of your non-hex Mesmer skills , that foe loses 1 Energy. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes [!15...83...100!] damage.
2734.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...33...40!] seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills.  If target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes [!15...83...100!] damage.

3191.name: Mistrust (PvP)
3191.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals [!10...62...75!] damage to that foe and all nearby foes.
3191.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals [!10...62...75!] damage to target and nearby foes.

3180.name: Shatter Delusions (PvP)
3180.desc_full: Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes [!15...63...75!] damage.
3180.desc_concise: Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: [!15...63...75!] damage to target and all adjacent foes.

3189.name: Spiritual Pain (PvP)
3189.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!5...33...40!] damage. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take [!25...105...125!] damage.
3189.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!5...33...40!] damage. Deals [!25...105...125!] damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

3188.name: Unnatural Signet (PvP)
3188.desc_full: Signet. Target foe takes [!10...50...60!] damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment , foes adjacent to your target take [!10...50...60!] damage. All your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled for 10 seconds.
3188.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!10...50...60!] damage. Deals [!10...50...60!] damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted. Your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled (10 seconds).

3234.name: Visions of Regret (PvP)
3234.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take [!10...26...30!] damage whenever they use a skill and [!5...33...40!] additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.
3234.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take [!10...26...30!] damage whenever they use a skill and [!5...33...40!] additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

3185.name: Psychic Instability (PvP)
3185.desc_full: Elite Spell. Interrupts the target foe 's action. If that action is a skill , that foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down for [!2...3...3!] seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)
3185.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, causes knockdown for [!2...3...3!] seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.

3187.name: Stolen Speed (PvP)
3187.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!1...8...10!] second[s], spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells you cast that target these foes take 50% less time to cast.
3187.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes ( [!1...8...10!] second[s]). Doubles spell casting time. Spells you cast on hexed foes have -50% casting time.

3184.name: Accumulated Pain (PvP)
3184.desc_full: Spell. Target foe takes [!10...30...35!] damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes , that foe suffers a Deep Wound for [!5...17...20!] seconds.
3184.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...30...35!] damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition ( [!5...17...20!] seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

3196.name: Calculated Risk (PvP)
3196.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!3...10...12!] seconds, target foe 's attacks do +10 damage , but there is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack will be done to that foe instead. (Maximum [!10...50...60!] damage.)
3196.desc_concise: Hex Spell. Target foe does +10 damage with attacks ( [!3...10...12!] seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum [!10...50...60!] ) will be done to that foe instead.

3152.name: Crippling Anguish (PvP)
3152.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target moves 50% slower and suffers - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration.
3152.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower and has - [!1...4...5!] Health degeneration.

3289.name: Fevered Dreams (PvP)
3289.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition , all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well.
3289.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires.

2998.name: Fragility (PvP)
2998.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!8...18...20!] seconds, target foe takes [!5...17...20!] damage each time that foe suffers or recovers from a new condition.
2998.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!8...18...20!] seconds.) Target foe takes [!5...17...20!] damage each time it gains or loses a condition.

3190.name: Frustration (PvP)
3190.desc_full: Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target foe casts spells 50% slower and takes [!5...41...50!] damage whenever interrupted.
3190.desc_concise: Hex Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes [!5...41...50!] damage whenever interrupted.

3373.name: Illusion of Haste (PvP)
3373.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...10...11!] seconds, you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.
3373.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...10...11!] seconds.) You move 33% faster. End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).

3374.name: Illusion of Pain (PvP)
3374.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 8 seconds, target foe has - [!3...9...10!] Health degeneration and takes [!3...9...10!] damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends or is reapplied, that foe is healed for [!36...103...120!].
3374.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Causes - [!3...9...10!] Health degeneration and target foe takes [!3...9...10!] damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for [!36...103...120!] . Ends if reapplied.

3181.name: Illusionary Weaponry (PvP)
3181.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals [!8...34...40!] damage to your targets for each melee attack.
3181.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals [!8...34...40!] damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.

3183.name: Migraine (PvP)
3183.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!3...10...12!] seconds, target foe suffers - [!1...7...8!] Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.
3183.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. ( [!3...10...12!] seconds.) Causes - [!1...7...8!] Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.

3186.name: Shared Burden (PvP)
3186.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack , cast spells , and move 33% slower.
3186.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( [!5...17...20!] seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.

3193.name: Signet of Clumsiness (PvP)
3193.desc_full: Signet. If target foe is attacking , that foe and all adjacent foes are interrupted and take [!15...51...60!] damage. Any foes using attack skills are knocked down.
3193.desc_concise: Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals [!15...51...60!] damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.

3195.name: Wandering Eye (PvP)
3195.desc_full: Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time target foe attacks , that attack is interrupted and all nearby foes take [!10...76...92!] damage.
3195.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: [!10...76...92!] damage to nearby foes.

3063.name: Mantra of Resolve (PvP)
3063.desc_full: Stance. For 5 seconds, you cannot be interrupted , but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose [!10...5...4!] Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.
3063.desc_concise: Stance. (5 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. Prevention cost: lose [![!10...5...4!]!] Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

3179.name: Mantra of Signets (PvP)
3179.desc_full: Stance. For [!10...34...40!] seconds, whenever you use a signet , you gain [!5...49...60!] Health.
3179.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!10...34...40!] seconds.) You gain [!5...49...60!] Health each time you use a signet.

3194.name: Mirror of Disenchantment (PvP)
3194.desc_full: Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. All of that foe's party members also lose that same enchantment.
3194.desc_concise: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

3386.name: Web of Disruption (PvP)
3386.desc_full: Hex Spell. Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.
3386.desc_concise: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

3396.name: Lightning Hammer (PvP)
3396.desc_full: Spell. Target foe is struck for [!10...82...100!] lightning damage. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.
3396.desc_concise: Spell. Deals [!10...82...100!] lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

2804.name: Mind Shock (PvP)
2804.desc_full: Elite Spell. Target foe suffers [!10...42...50!] lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers [!10...42...50!] more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
2804.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...42...50!] lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals + [!10...42...50!] lightning damage and causes knockdown. 25% armor penetration.

2807.name: Ride the Lightning (PvP)
2807.desc_full: Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for [!1...4...5!] second[s]. If your target is a foe, it is struck for [!10...58...70!] lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
2807.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!10...58...70!] lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

2809.name: Obsidian Flame (PvP)
2809.desc_full: Spell. Deal [!22...78...92!] damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

2860.name: Ether Renewal (PvP)
2860.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, each time you cast a spell , you gain [!1...3...3!] Energy and [!5...17...20!] Health for each enchantment on you.
2860.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain [!1...3...3!] Energy and [!5...17...20!] Health for each enchantment on you.

3375.name: Aura of Restoration (PvP)
3375.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain [!0...1...1!] Energy and are healed for [!200...360...400!] % of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.
3375.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain [!0...1...1!] Energy and are healed for [!200...360...400!] % of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

3397.name: Elemental Flame (PvP)
3397.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!5...17...20!] seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe , that foe is set on fire for [!1...2...2!] second[s].
3397.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...17...20!] seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition ( [!1...2...2!] second[s]) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target .

3021.name: Savannah Heat (PvP)
3021.desc_full: Elite Spell. You create Savannah Heat at target foe 's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take [!5...17...20!] fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.
3021.desc_concise: Elite Spell. Deals [!5...17...20!] fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.

2803.name: Mind Freeze (PvP)
2803.desc_full: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes [!10...34...40!] cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional [!10...34...40!] cold damage and moves 90% slower for [!1...4...5!] seconds.
2803.desc_concise: Elite Hex Spell. Deals [!10...34...40!] cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals + [!10...34...40!] cold damage and causes 90% slower movement ( [!1...4...5!] second[s]).

2805.name: Mist Form (PvP)
2805.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!10...38...45!] seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell , all non- spirit allies in earshot are healed for [!50...210...250!] % of the Energy cost of the spell. This spell does not heal allies above 80% Health.
2805.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...38...45!] seconds.) Take 33% less damage from foes hexed with Water Magic. Heals non-spirit allies in earshot for [!50...210...250!] % of the energy cost of your elemental spells. Does not heal allies above 80% Health.

3398.name: Slippery Ground (PvP)
3398.desc_full: Spell. If target foe is Blind or moving , that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Water Magic 4 or less.)
3398.desc_concise: Spell. Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. 50% failure chance unless Water Magic 5 or higher.

2806.name: Ward Against Harm (PvP)
2806.desc_full: Elite Ward Spell. Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, non- spirit allies in this area have + [!1...3...3!] health regeneration , + [!12...22...24!] armor , and an additional + [!12...22...24!] armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 30 seconds.
2806.desc_concise: Elite Ward Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Allies in this ward have + [!1...3...3!] Health regeneration, + [!12...22...24!] armor, and + [!12...22...24!] additional armor against elemental damage. Spirits are unaffected. This spell is disabled for 30 seconds.

2869.name: Assassin's Remedy (PvP)
2869.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next [!1...8...10!] attack skills you use remove one condition.
2869.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next [!1...8...10!] attack skills each remove one condition.

3061.name: Death Blossom (PvP)
3061.desc_full: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for + [!20...40...45!] damage and all adjacent foes take [!20...40...45!] damage.
3061.desc_concise: Dual Attack. Deals + [!20...40...45!] damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. Must follow an off-hand attack.

3251.name: Fox Fangs (PvP)
3251.desc_full: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for + [!10...22...25!] damage if it hits.
3251.desc_concise: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + [!10...22...25!] damage. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

3252.name: Wild Strike (PvP)
3252.desc_full: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for + [!10...30...35!] damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
3252.desc_concise: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + [!10...30...35!] damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

3053.name: Signet of Deadly Corruption (PvP)
3053.desc_full: Signet. Must follow a dual attack. Target foe takes [!5...29...35!] damage for each condition on that foe (maximum 130 damage).
3053.desc_concise: Signet. Deals [!5...29...35!] damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe. Must follow a dual attack.

2862.name: Shadow Form (PvP)
2862.desc_full: Elite Enchantment Spell. For [!5...13...15!] seconds, all hostile spells that target you fail and all attacks against you miss. When Shadow Form ends, lose all but [!5...41...50!] Health.
2862.desc_concise: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( [!5...13...15!] seconds.) Hostile spells targeting you fail, and attacks against you miss. End effect: lose all but [![!5...41...50!]!] Health.

3048.name: Shroud of Distress (PvP)
3048.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!30...54...60!] seconds, if you are below 50% Health , you have a 75% chance to block attacks.
3048.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!30...54...60!] seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. No effect unless your Health is below 50%.

3049.name: Unseen Fury (PvP)
3049.desc_full: Stance. For [!15...51...60!] seconds, you cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.
3049.desc_concise: Stance. ( [!15...51...60!] seconds.) You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.

2867.name: Ancestors' Rage (PvP)
2867.desc_full: Skill. For 3 seconds all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for [!1...33...41!] lightning damage each second.
2867.desc_concise: Skill. (3 seconds.) Deals [!1...33...41!] lightning damage to foes adjacent to target ally each second.

2965.name: Signet of Spirits (PvP)
2965.desc_full: Elite Signet. You gain [!3...10...12!] Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.
2965.desc_concise: Elite Signet. You gain [!3...10...12!] Energy. No effect unless you are within earshot of a spirit.

2868.name: Splinter Weapon (PvP)
2868.desc_full: Weapon Spell. For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next [!1...4...5!] attack [s] deal [!5...25...30!] damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.
2868.desc_concise: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) Attacks deal [!5...25...30!] damage to 3 [ sic ] adjacent foes. Ends after [![!1...4...5!]!] attack[s].

3038.name: Agony (PvP)
3038.desc_full: Binding Ritual. Create a level [!1...7...8!] spirit. This spirit causes [!3...9...10!] Health loss each second to foes within earshot. This spirit loses [!3...9...10!] Health for each foe hurt in this way. This spirit dies after [!30...78...90!] seconds.
3038.desc_concise: Binding Ritual. Creates a level [!1...7...8!] spirit ( [!30...78...90!] second lifespan). Causes [!3...9...10!] Health loss each second to foes in earshot. This spirit loses [![!3...9...10!]!] Health for each foe that loses Health.

3019.name: Bloodsong (PvP)
3019.desc_full: Binding Ritual. Create a level [!1...7...8!] spirit who dies after [!30...126...150!] seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to [!5...21...25!] Health.
3019.desc_concise: Binding Ritual. Creates a level [!1...7...8!] spirit ( [!30...126...150!] second lifespan). Its attacks steal [!5...21...25!] Health.

3008.name: Destruction (PvP)
3008.desc_full: Binding Ritual. Create a level [!1...8...10!] Spirit [ sic ] that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take [!1...8...10!] damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum of 150 damage).
3008.desc_concise: Binding Ritual. Creates a level [!1...8...10!] spirit (30 second lifespan). On death, it deals [!1...8...10!] damage for each second it was alive to all foes in the area (maximum 150 damage).

3022.name: Gaze of Fury (PvP)
3022.desc_full: Binding Ritual. Destroy target allied spirit and create a level [!1...8...10!] Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal [!5...17...20!] damage. This spirit dies after [!30...54...60!] seconds.
3022.desc_concise: Binding Ritual. Destroys an allied spirit. Creates a level [!1...8...10!] spirit ( [!30...54...60!] second lifespan). Its attacks deal [!5...17...20!] damage.

2966.name: Signet of Ghostly Might (PvP)
2966.desc_full: Elite Signet. Target allied summoned creature 's attacks deal [!5...29...35!] more damage. After 10 seconds, that creature is destroyed.
2966.desc_concise: Elite Signet. Target allied summoned creature deals + [!5...29...35!] damage. That creature is destroyed after 10 seconds.

3023.name: Anguish (PvP)
3023.desc_full: Binding Ritual. Create a level [!1...6...7!] spirit. This spirit's attacks deal [!5...17...20!] damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after [!15...39...45!] seconds.
3023.desc_concise: Binding Ritual. Creates a level [!1...6...7!] spirit ( [!15...39...45!] second lifespan). Its attacks deal [!5...17...20!] damage.  Double damage to hexed foes.

3003.name: Armor of Unfeeling (PvP)
3003.desc_full: Enchantment Spell. For [!10...30...35!] seconds, you have 10 base damage reduction while casting Binding Rituals.
3003.desc_concise: Enchantment Spell. ( [!10...30...35!] seconds.) You have 10 base damage reduction while casting binding rituals.

3017.name: Disenchantment (PvP)
3017.desc_full: Binding Ritual. Create a level [!1...7...8!] spirit. This spirit deals [!5...17...20!] damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after [!10...30...35!] seconds.
